name: Passenger Mini Footboard Mount Kit

The new position clears the path for your feet to ease walking the bike in and out of parking spaces. When folded, the pegs are tighter to the bike to reduce the chance of contacting the passenger foot support with your calf.

Defined by sweeping curves, this complete assortment of hand and foot controls feature a rich tuxedo black finish that is the perfect complement to your sinister ride. The design incorporates a field of textured black rubber surrounded with deep longitudinal lines, and is finished with a contemporary H-D™ logo. The complete Defiance Collection sets a new rebellious direction in customizing.

description: Shroud your bike in mystery. This blacked-out hand and foot control collection features distinctive knurled surfaces that expose the raw billet aluminum for a dramatic contrast.

name: Streamliner Rider Footboard Kit
description: Inspired by the art-deco designs of the Streamliner era, this collection reflects the simple lines and shapes that still remain contemporary today.
details: Fits '12-'16 FLD and '86-'17 FL Softail™ (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTFB and FLSTFBS), '86-later Touring (except FLHTCUL and FLHTKL) and Trike models.

name: Swept Wing Rider Footboard Pan - Right
description: Add a sleek tapered look to your footboard-equipped model. These chrome-plated Swept Wing Pans are installed using the Original Equipment mounts and hardware.
details: Fits '12-'16 FLD and '86-'17 FL Softail™ (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTFB and FLSTFBS), Touring (except FLHTCUL, FLHTKL and FLHTCUL TC) and Trike models.

description: Add a sleek tapered look to your footboard-equipped model. These chrome-plated Swept Wing Pans are installed using the Original Equipment mounts and hardware.
details: Fits '12-'16 FLD and '86-'17 FL Softail™ (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTFB and FLSTFBS), Touring (except FLHTCUL, FLHTKL and FLHTCUL TC) and Trike models.

name: Diamond Black Footpegs with Wear Peg
description: Shroud your bike in mystery. This blacked-out hand and foot control collection features distinctive knurled surfaces that expose the raw billet aluminum for a dramatic contrast. Designed to age and break-in like a pair of comfortable stone-washed jeans, the satin black finish will complement both high-gloss and denim paint colors.

name: Rider Cup Holder
description: Shaped to blend with the contours of your Harley-Davidson™ motorcycle, this unique cup holder is easy to reach without cluttering the handlebar.
details: Fits '00-'17 Softail™ (except FXSE) models without ABS Brakes.

name: Reduced Reach Forward Control Conversion Kit
description: Love the look and riding position you get with forward controls but not comfortable with the long stretch forward? This Forward Control Conversion Kit repositions the Original Equipment footpegs and foot controls up and back by over 1", positioning the controls closer to the rider for added comfort and confidence.
details: Fits '03-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD) with forward controls.

name: Reduced Reach Forward Control Kit
description: Want to stretch the riding position of your mid-control equipped model, but not comfortable with the long reach to factory-position forward controls? This complete kit is the perfect alternative. It positions the feet up and forward 10" from the mid-control position, but 1" closer to the rider than the standard position factory forward controls, placing the rider's boot at a comfortable pivot point for improved support and leverage.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models with mid controls.  FLD models require separate purchase of Footpegs.

name: Reduced Reach Forward Control Kit
description: Want to stretch the riding position of your mid-control equipped model, but not comfortable with the long reach to factory-position forward controls? This complete kit is the perfect alternative. It positions the feet up and forward 10" from the mid-control position, but 1" closer to the rider than the standard position factory forward controls, placing the rider's boot at a comfortable pivot point for improved support and leverage.

name: Standard Chrome Forward Control Kit
description: Add the stretched-out look and extended riding position to your Sportster™ model.
details: Fits ’14-later XL models. Requires separate purchase of stock or accessory rider position footpegs with wear pegs that fit ’14-later XL1200 models.

name: Standard Black Forward Control Kit
description: Add the stretched-out look and extended riding position to your Sportster™ model.
details: Fits ’14-later XL models. Requires separate purchase of stock or accessory rider position footpegs with wear pegs that fit ’14-later XL1200 models.

name: Further Forward Mid-Control Kit - Chrome
description: Feel a little cramped when your feet are placed on the standard-location mid-controls? This kit eliminates the “knees-high” riding attitude while maintaining a sporty upright riding posture.
details: Fits '14-later XL models.

name: Further Forward Mid-Control Kit - Gloss Black
description: Feel a little cramped when your feet are placed on the standard-location mid-controls? This kit eliminates the “knees-high” riding attitude while maintaining a sporty upright riding posture.
details: Fits '14-later XL models.

name: Rear Set Foot Controls
description: Transform the on-street profile of your Sportster™ model. Moving the foot controls to a rear-mounted location takes the riding position from a relaxed cruiser to a solo, aggressive, curve-carving posture. When combined with a Clip-On or Clubman Handlebar, the resulting hands-forward and feet-back profile drapes the rider over the bike and makes you feel a part of the machine.
details: Fits '14-later XL883N, XL883L, XL1200CX, XL1200T, and XL1200X models and '18-later XL1200NS and XL1200XS models. Does not fit with Rail Collection Sprocket Cover P/N 34800032. For use with solo seat application only. Installation of Rear Set Controls requires removal of passenger foot pegs, therefore removal of the Original Equipment two-up seat and installation of a solo-only seat is required. See your Dealer for solo seat options.

name: Willie G Skull Rider Footboard Inserts
description: Add a little attitude to your ride. Styled to complement Harley-Davidson™ Skull accessory items, the menacing raised skull with black-filled eyes leaps from a field of chrome.

name: Willie G Skull Rider Footboard Inserts
description: Add a little attitude to your ride. Styled to complement Harley-Davidson™ Skull accessory items, the menacing raised skull with black-filled eyes leaps from a field of chrome.

description: Add a little attitude to your ride. Styled to complement Harley-Davidson™ Skull accessory items, the menacing raised skull with black-filled eyes leaps from a field of chrome.
details: Fits models equipped with traditional-style passenger footboards.

name: Swept Wing Passenger Footboard Pans - Smooth
description: These unique Swept Wing Passenger Footboard Pans complement the Swept Wing Rider Footboard Shape, and allow you to replace the Original Equipment passenger footpegs on certain models with footboards.
details: Fits ’06-’17 Dyna™, ’00-later Softail (except FXFB, FXFBS and FXDRS) and ’86-later Touring and Trike models equipped with passenger footboard supports.

name: Chrome Passenger Footboard Pans
description: Replace the factory black painted passenger footboard with the custom look of smooth chrome.
details: Fits ’06-’17 Dyna™, ’00-later Softail (except FXFB, FXFBS and FXDRS) and ’86-later Touring and Trike models equipped with passenger footboard supports.

name: Adjustable Passenger Footpeg Mount Kit
description: Maximize your passenger's riding comfort. Proper foot position reduces the cramped or stretched-out feeling, and relieves pressure on the knees and the tail bone.

name: Adjustable Passenger Footboard Mount Kit
description: Maximize your passenger's riding comfort. These 5-position adjustable mounts raise and lower the passenger footboard.
details: Fits '93-later Touring models. Does not fit Trike models.

name: Harley-Davidson Script Passenger Footboard Covers
description: Add a touch of style to the profile of your bike.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™, '86-'17 FL Softail™ and '87-later Touring and Trike models equipped with traditional D-shaped aluminum passenger footboards.

name: Reach Passenger Footboard Mount Kit
description: Kit raises the height of your passenger footboards by approximately 2-1/4" for increased passenger comfort. Especially desirable on '97-later Touring models due to the frame and saddlebag guard change.
details: Fits '93-later Touring models. Does not fit Trike models. Does not fit with saddlebag guard bags.

name: Half-Moon Passenger Footboard Pans and Inserts
description: Styled to match the Half-Moon Rider Footboards, these classic passenger footboards add both style and comfort to your nostalgic ride.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™, '00-later Softail™ (except FXDRS) and '86-later Touring models equipped with passenger footboard supports. Does not fit Trike models.

name: Half-Moon Passenger Footboard Pans and Inserts
description: Styled to match the Half-Moon Rider Footboards, these classic passenger footboards add both style and comfort to your nostalgic ride.

name: Long Angled Adjustable Highway Peg Mount Kit
description: Stretch out for added comfort. This chrome-plated Adjustable Highway Peg Mounting Kit can be set for shorter riders, and it can be reversed to reach far forward for those with long legs.

name: Short Angled Adjustable Highway Peg Mount Kit
description: Stretch out for added comfort. This chrome-plated Adjustable Highway Peg Mounting Kit can be set for shorter riders, and it can be reversed to reach far forward for those with long legs.
details: Fits 1.25" engine guards. Does not fit with Chopped Engine Guards.

name: 360 Degree Adjustable Highway Peg Mounting Kit
description: Change your foot position for added comfort on long stretches of open road. The 360 degree Adjustable Highway Peg can be rotated and locked in a wide range of positions to accommodate both the tall and short rider.

name: Whiskers Adjustable Highway Bar
description: Stretch your legs and change riding position while you rack up the miles. Frame-mounted bar can be pivoted fore and aft to accommodate your inseam length, and locks in place with a common Allen wrench.

name: Whiskers Adjustable Highway Bar
description: Stretch your legs and change riding position while you rack up the miles. Frame-mounted bar can be pivoted fore and aft to accommodate your inseam length, and locks in place with a common Allen wrench.
details: Fits '00-'17 Softail™ models (except FXCW, FXCWC, FXS, FXSB, FXSBSE and FXSE) without ABS. Also fits '14-'15 FLSTNSE when Original Equipment engine guard is removed. Does not fit with Boom!™ Audio Cruiser Amp and Speaker Kit P/N 76262-08A, 76320-08A, 76321-09, Heel Raiser Footpeg Kit P/N 50178-09 or Mini Footboard Kits P/N 50500109, 50500124, 50500139, 50500144 or 50451-09.

name: Footpeg Three-Piece Chrome Clamp
description: Designed for use on frame or engine guard.

name: Sundowner Solo Seat

name: Super Reach Solo Seat
description: Get a little bit closer. Super Reach forward position seats are designed to move riders with a shorter inseam even closer to the controls and to bring the legs closer together so that your feet rest firmly on the pavement. After hundreds of hours of on-road and ergonomic testing, the seat shape and foam density were selected as the ideal position for riders 5'0" to 5'4" tall.

name: Tallboy Solo Seat
description: Stretch your legs in style. The Tallboy™ Solo Seat allows additional leg and arm movement for the long-limbed rider and the long seating space permits fore and aft repositioning while on the open road.

name: Low-Profile Solo Touring Seat
description: Set your custom bagger apart with a Low-Profile Solo Seat that combines street-rod style with a surprising touch of comfort. Start with a shape that distributes your weight across a wide surface area to reduce pressure points. The result is the slammed custom seat that you crave with enough comfort and support to let you actually spend time in the saddle.
details: Fits '09-later Touring models. Does not fit Trike models. Does not accept Rider Backrest. Seat width 15.0".

name: Low-Profile Solo Touring Seat
description: Set your custom bagger apart with a Low-Profile Solo Seat that combines street-rod style with a surprising touch of comfort. Start with a shape that distributes your weight across a wide surface area to reduce pressure points. The result is the slammed custom seat that you crave with enough comfort and support to let you actually spend time in the saddle.
details: Fits '09-later Touring models. Does not fit Trike models. Does not accept Rider Backrest. Seat width 15.0".

name: Tallboy Seat
description: The seat is sculpted to provide superior support and comfort, with a slight bucket shape to provide room to vary your riding position fore and aft. The seat’s level seating surface does not pitch the rider forward, and the overall ride height is similar to stock Electra Glide™ and Road Glide™ Ultra seating.
details: Fits ’14-later Touring and Trike models. Not compatible with Adjustable Rider Backrest kits. Seat width 16.5"  passenger pillion width 15.0".

name: Reach Solo Seat
description: From the custom metal Bar & Shield medallion to the sleek fast-back design, this seat is shaped to deliver the ergonomic position that a shorter rider needs.

name: Leather Badlander Seat
description: The traditional Badlander™ low and lean style sets the stage for your minimalist custom ride. The frame-hugging rider seat and the slim tapered passenger pillion visually stretch the bike and enhance the slammed look.
details: Fits '07-'17 FLSTF, FLSTFB, FLSTFBS, FLSTSB, and '06-'15 FXST, FXSTB, FXSTC, FXSTS and '07-'08 FXSTSSE models. Does not fit FLSTSE models. FLSTSB models require separate purchase of Passenger Footpeg Mounting Kit P/N 50932-08 and passenger footpegs. Seat width 12.0"  passenger pillion width 6.5".

name: Leather Badlander Seat
description: The traditional Badlander™ low and lean style sets the stage for your minimalist custom ride. The frame-hugging rider seat and the slim tapered passenger pillion visually stretch the bike and enhance the slammed look.

name: Leather Badlander Seat

name: Café Solo Seat
description: There’s something about the placement of the rider that makes the Cafe Solo Seat special. The one-up design features a high back pad that holds the rider in place and provide a direct connection to the bike. You sit “in” the bike, and your hands and feet reach naturally to the controls. The low-slung black vinyl covered pad, the narrow nose and the tapered tail enhance the bike’s sporting profile and pays homage to the heritage of the iconic Café Racer style.

name: Brawler Solo Seat
description: When it's time to go it alone, go solo in style. This premium quality cowhide leather saddle features a smooth, sleek design that hugs the frame rails for a true custom look.

Seat width 16.0"  passenger pillion width 14.0".

name: Rigid Mount Installation Kit
description: Get the low lean minimalistic garage built look.

name: Spring Saddle Installation Kit
description: Achieve the optimum balance of style and function. Required when fitting a Spring Solo Saddle on ’18-later Street Bob and Softail Slim models, this kit includes everything needed for a simple bolt-on installation. Features beehive style springs that maximize seat travel while maintaining a low profile, a custom formed steel under-seat cover, a polished stainless steel hinge, and all necessary hardware.
details: Fits '18-later FLSL, FXBB, FXLRS and FXST models.

name: Rigid Mount Saddle Installation Kit
description: Get the low lean minimalistic garage built look when you want it. Designed for installation in conjunction with the Spring Saddle Installation Kit P/N 52100029, this kit lets you swap the beehive springs with short post mounts for a truly slammed look.

name: Heated & Cooled Seat Trike Support Bracket
description: Support bracket required for installing Harley Hammock Heated Rider and Passenger Touring Seat or Sundowner Heated & Cooled Seat on Trike models.
details: Fits ‘14-later Tri Glide™ models. Required for installation of Harley Hammock Heated Rider and Passenger Touring Seat P/N 52000462 or Sundowner Heated & Cooled Seat P/N 52000463.

name: H-D Detachables Sideplates
description: In the time it takes for a traffic light to change, you can transform your motorcycle from a city cruiser to a cross country hauler. Forming the base for this quick change act are H-D™ Detachables™ Sissy Bar Sideplates.
details: Fits ’06-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD). Requires separate purchase of appropriate Docking Hardware kit. ’13-'17 FXDB models equipped with a side-mount license plate require License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 67900130. ’13-later FXDB HDI/India configuration requires separate purchase of Docking Hardware and Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800499. Not for use with LED Rear Turn Signal Kit P/N 67800055A or 67800056A.

name: Harley-Davidson Helmet Lock
description: This carabineer-style universal helmet lock protects your helmet, jacket or bag from casual grab-and go theft.

name: Harley-Davidson Helmet / Jacket Security Cable
description: This handy cable is a great complement to the Harley-Davidson™ Helmet Lock.

name: Badlander Seat
description: Once again, bad is good. The popular Badlander™ Custom Seat is available for your Touring model.
details: Fits '97-'07 Electra Glide™ (except FLHX) and Road Glide™ models. Seat width 12.5"  passenger pillion width 4.5".

name: Badlander Seat
description: Clean smooth cover, subtle top-stitching and a frame-hugging profile add up to a statement only Harley could create.

name: Badlander Seat
description: Clean smooth cover, subtle top-stitching and a frame-hugging profile add up to a statement only Harley could create.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models. FXD, FXDB, and FXDLS models require separate purchase of Seat Bumper Kit P/N 51653-06, Passenger Footpegs, and Passenger Footpeg Mounting Kit P/N 50210-06. Seat width 11.0"  passenger pillion width 5.0".

name: Badlander Seat
description: Clean smooth cover, subtle top-stitching and a frame-hugging profile add up to a statement only Harley could create.

name: Reduced Reach Seat
description: Designed specifically for riders requiring a close to the bar riding position, this seat positions the rider approximately 1" forward, closer to the hand and foot controls. The narrow front profile brings your legs closer together to help you plant your feet firmly on the ground.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models. FXD, FXDB, and FXDLS models require separate purchase of Seat Bumper Kit P/N 51653-06, Passenger Footpegs, and Passenger Footpeg Mounting Kit P/N 50210-06. Seat width 12.0"  passenger pillion width 9.0".

name: Badlander Seat
description: Clean smooth covers, subtle top-stitching, and a frame-hugging profile add up to a statement only Harley™ could create. The low, lean look also offers the benefit of a reduced seat height, ideal for riders wanting the lowest possible ride.

name: Badlander Seat
description: Clean smooth covers, subtle top-stitching, and a frame-hugging profile add up to a statement only Harley™ could create. The low, lean look also offers the benefit of a reduced seat height, ideal for riders wanting the lowest possible ride.

name: Badlander Seat
description: Clean smooth covers, subtle top-stitching and a frame-hugging profile add up to a statement only Harley could create.
details: Fits '83-'03 XL models. Seat width 12.0"  passenger pillion width 5.0".

name: Standard Mini-Medallion Style Sissy Bar Upright
description: Give your passenger additional back support with a Mini Medallion Sissy Bar Upright, designed to accept a wide variety of Backrest Pads. When combined with your choice of fixed or detachable sideplates, this upright forms a complete passenger backrest system.

name: Standard Mini-Medallion Style Sissy Bar Upright
description: Give your passenger additional back support with a Mini Medallion Sissy Bar Upright, designed to accept a wide variety of Backrest Pads. When combined with your choice of fixed or detachable sideplates, this upright forms a complete passenger backrest system.

name: Low Mini-Medallion Style Sissy Bar Upright
description: Give your passenger additional back support with a Mini Medallion Sissy Bar Upright, designed to accept a wide variety of Backrest Pads. When combined with your choice of fixed or detachable sideplates, this upright forms a complete passenger backrest system.

name: Low Mini-Medallion Style Sissy Bar Upright
description: Give your passenger additional back support with a Mini Medallion Sissy Bar Upright, designed to accept a wide variety of Backrest Pads. When combined with your choice of fixed or detachable sideplates, this upright forms a complete passenger backrest system.
details: Fits '04-later XL models with H-D™ Detachables™ sideplates, '06-'17 Dyna™ models (except FXDF, FXDFSE and '10-'17 FXDWG), '84-'05 Softail™ (except FXSTD) and '06-'17 FL Softail™ (except '07-'17 FLS, FLSS, FLSTF, FLSTFB, FLSTFBS, FLSTSE and FLSTSB and '06 FLSTFSE) with appropriate sideplates. Does not fit with Five Bar Sport Luggage Racks P/N 53862-00 and 53939-03.

name: Smooth Passenger Backrest Pad
description: Styled to complement the FXS Original Equipment or accessory seats, this compact Backrest Pad is the perfect match for the Softail™ Blackline™ motorcycle.
details: Fits '12-'17 FLS and FLSS and '11-'13 FXS models equipped with Sissy Bar Upright P/N 52760-11 or 52828-11.

name: One-Piece H-D Detachables Sissy Bar Upright
description: The sweeping shape of this slim, solid bar Sissy Bar Upright completes the classic bobber look. The one-piece design eliminates separate sideplates for a clean appearance, and the stylized upper kick angle mimics the old-school sissy bars of the 50s and 60s.

name: One-Piece H-D Detachables Sissy Bar Upright
description: The sweeping shape of this slim, solid bar Sissy Bar Upright completes the classic bobber look. The one-piece design eliminates separate sideplates for a clean appearance, and the stylized upper kick angle mimics the old-school sissy bars of the 50s and 60s.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD, FXDF, FXDFSE and '10-'17 FXDWG). Requires separate purchase of appropriate Docking Hardware Kit. '13-'17 FXDB and '16-'17 FXDLS models equipped with a side-mount license plate require License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 67900130. Not for use with LED Rear Turn Signal Kit P/N 67800055A or 67800056A.

name: Low Mini-Medallion Style Sissy Bar Upright
description: Give your passenger additional back support with a Sissy Bar Upright, designed to accept a wide variety of Backrest Pads. When combined with your choice of fixed or detachable sideplates, this upright forms a complete passenger backrest system.
details: Fits '10-'17 FXDF and FXDWG and '10 FXDFSE models with appropriate sideplates.

name: Low Mini-Medallion Style Sissy Bar Upright
description: Give your passenger additional back support with a Sissy Bar Upright, designed to accept a wide variety of Backrest Pads. When combined with your choice of fixed or detachable sideplates, this upright forms a complete passenger backrest system.

name: H-D Detachables Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of H-D™ Detachables™ sideplates, sissy bars and racks on specified models.

name: H-D Detachables Sideplates
description: In the time it takes for a traffic light to change, you can transform your motorcycle from a city cruiser to a cross country hauler. Forming the base for this quick change act are Harley-Davidson™'s exclusive H-D™ Detachables™ Sissy Bar Sideplates.
details: Fits '12-'16 FLD models. Requires separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 52300065.

name: Wide Circulator Pad
description: Keep comfortable on your travels. The Circular Backrest Pad promotes air movement and reduces heat build-up where the rider's body touches the backrest.
details: Fits wide profile rider and passenger backrest pads up to 12" wide and 9" tall.

name: Wrap-Around Circulator Backrest Pad
description: Keep comfortable on your next long ride. These breathable Circulator Backrest Pads feature 3D construction that promotes air movement and reduces heat build-up where the rider's body touches the backrest.
details: Fits Tour-Pak™ Wrap Around Passenger Backrest Pads.

name: Bungee Cord Soft-Hook Extensions
description: Keep your luggage firmly in place. Simply loop these Soft-Hook Extensions around your luggage rack bar, and you have a secure connection point for bungee hooks.
details: For use on all luggage racks with rails up to .75" in diameter.

name: Short Passenger Backrest Pad
description: This Short Passenger Backrest Pad is the perfect complement to the Mahogany Brown Seat and Pillion collection. Styled to match the 12 FLTRXSE model and shaped to accent the sweeping design of a low-profile seat, it's slim profile also provides additional passenger room.
details: Fits Short H-D Detachables Passenger Sissy Bar Upright P/N 52935-04A, 52610-09A or 54248-09A. Also fits ’18-later Softail models equipped with Short or Standard Height HoldFast Sissy Bar Uprights. Will not fit seats with tall passenger pillion pads.  Pad height 6.5"  width 10.5"

name: H-D Detachables Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of H-D™ Detachables™ Saddlebags on Breakout™ models.

name: H-D Detachables Docking Hardware Kit
description: Docking hardware required to install H-D™ Detachables™ Saddlebags and accessories.
details: Fits '13-'17 FXSB and FXSBSE and '16-'17 FXSE models equipped with Detachable Saddlebags P/N 90200765 OR 90200784 and Detachable Accessories.

name: Quick Release Rider Backrest
description: Enjoy exceptional comfort when riding the open road or around town with a unique backrest-only solution from Harley-Davidson™.
details: Fits '04-later XL models equipped with a solo seat. Not compatible with Brawler™ Solo Seat P/N 52940-04B, 52941-04B, 52000118, 52000119, Cafe Solo Seat P/N 52000260, Sundowner™ Solo Seat P/N 52000203,  Tallboy™ Solo Seat P/N 52000209, Solo Rigid or Spring Seat Mounting Kits, '16-later Original Equipment XL883N Solo Seat, or Side-Mount License Plate Kits P/N 60947-10 or 60972-10. Installation of H-D™ Detachables™ Solo Luggage Rack requires additional purchase of Bolt P/N 3584 (Qty. 4).

name: Premium H-D Detachables Backrest with Adjustable Recline
description: Enhance your passenger's ride with an adjustable passenger backrest. This adjustable backrest allows the passenger to change the recline angle for maximum comfort.

name: Premium H-D Detachables Backrest with Adjustable Recline
description: Enhance your passenger's ride with an adjustable passenger backrest. This adjustable backrest allows the passenger to change the recline angle for maximum comfort.
details: Fits '09-later Touring models equipped with required Docking Hardware Kits (except models equipped with Stealth Detach Luggage Rack). '09-later Touring models equipped with rigid-mount Tour-Pak™ luggage require purchase or appropriate H-D™ Detachables™ Tour-Pak™ Conversion Kit .

name: Compact Passenger Backrest Pad
description: A sissy bar upright and passenger backrest pad are the starting point to build a complete touring machine. The backrest pad provides long-range comfort and support, and adds a feeling of control and confidence for the passenger.
details: Fits '15-later XG models equipped with Sissy Bar Upright P/N 52300283 or 52300307.

name: Sissy Bar Upright
description: A sissy bar upright and passenger backrest pad are the starting point to build a complete touring machine. This unique upright attaches directly to the H-D™ Detachables™ Two-Up Luggage Rack for a clean, custom look.
details: Fits '15-later XG models (except XG750A). Requires separate purchase of DockiNg Hardware Kit P/N 52300285.

name: Docking Hardware for Detachable Two-Up Luggage Rack
description: Required for installation of Detachable Two-Up Luggage Rack P/N 50300071 and 50300091 on Harley-Davidson Street models.

name: CVO Road Glide Custom Short Passenger Backrest Pad
description: Backrest pad matches 13 CVO™ Road Glide™ Original Equipment seat.
details: Fits Short H-D Detachables Passenger Sissy Bar Upright P/N 52935-04A, 52610-09A or 54248-09A. Also fits ’18-later Softail models equipped with Short or Standard Height HoldFast Sissy Bar Uprights. Will not fit seats with tall passenger pillion pads.  Pad height 6.5"  width 10.5"

name: Air Wing Passenger Backrest Pad
description: This backrest pad is styled to complement available touring and custom seats.

name: Sissy Bar Upright
description: A sissy bar upright and passenger backrest pad are the starting point to build a complete touring machine. This unique upright attaches directly to the H-D™ Detachables™ Two-Up Luggage Rack for a clean, custom look.

name: King Tour-Pak Backrest Pad - Smooth
description: Wrap-around King Tour-Pak™ Backrest Pad is shaped to surround your passenger in comfort. The curved shape cradles the back, and the integrated side wings fit naturally beneath your passenger's arms for added support.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Tri Glide models equipped with King Tour-Pak luggage.

name: King Tour-Pak Backrest Pad - Comfort Stitch
description: Wrap-around King Tour-Pak™ Backrest Pad is shaped to surround your passenger in comfort. The curved shape cradles the back, and the integrated side wings fit naturally beneath your passenger's arms for added support.

name: Sun Ray Heated King Tour-Pak Backrest Pad
description: Take the chill out of cool spring days and brisk fall nights with a Sun Ray™ heated wrap-around backrest pad.

name: Chopped Tour-Pak Backrest Pad
description: Clean, smooth styling complements most seating surfaces.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Tri Glide models equipped with Chopped Tour-Pak luggage.

name: Quick-Release Sissy Bar Upright - Freewheeler
description: Add passenger comfort and support to your Freewheeler™ Trike model.
details: Fits '15-later FLRT models.

name: King Tour-Pak Backrest Pad – CVO Road King Styling
description: Wrap-around King Tour-Pak™ Backrest Pad is shaped to surround your passenger in comfort. The curved shape cradles the back, and the integrated side wings fit naturally beneath your passenger's arms for added support.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Tri Glide models equipped with King Tour-Pak luggage.

name: 4-Point Docking Hardware Kit
description: The ideal choice for maximum versatility, this complete kit contains the docking hardware necessary to install all H-D™ Detachables™ accessory options. Even if you only install a passenger backrest today, this kit allows you to add additional accessories as your touring demands change. Provides docking points to allow installation of H-D™ Detachables™ Sissy Bar, Solo Luggage Rack, 2-Up Luggage Rack, Solo Tour-Pak™ or 2-Up Tour-Pak™ Rack.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models (except models equipped with rigid-mount Tour-Pak™ luggage).

name: 4-Point Docking Hardware Kit - Gloss Black
description: The ideal choice for maximum versatility, this complete kit contains the docking hardware necessary to install all H-D™ Detachables™ accessory options. Even if you only install a passenger backrest today, this kit allows you to add additional accessories as your touring demands change. Provides docking points to allow installation of H-D™ Detachables™ Sissy Bar, Solo Luggage Rack, 2-Up Luggage Rack, Solo Tour-Pak™ or 2-Up Tour-Pak™ Rack.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models (except models equipped with rigid-mount Tour-Pak™ luggage).

name: Chopped Tour-Pak Backrest Pads - CVO Street Glide Styling
description: Chopped Tour-Pak™ Backrest Pads provide deep padded support for your passenger, and a low-profile shape that complements the low, lean look of your Tour-Pak™.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Tri Glide models equipped with Chopped Tour-Pak luggage.

name: King Tour-Pak Backrest Pad - CVO Street Glide Styling
description: Wrap-around King Tour-Pak™ Backrest Pad is shaped to surround your passenger in comfort. The curved shape cradles the back, and the integrated side wings fit naturally beneath your passenger's arms for added support.

name: Short Passenger Backrest Pad – CVO Street Glide Styling
description: The slim profile allows additional passenger room, and the low overall height continues the long and lean profile of your custom Touring bike.

name: Hammock Adjustable Rider Backrest

The frame-hugging rider seat and the slim tapered passenger pillion visually stretch the bike and enhance the slammed look. The seat shape stays low along its entire length and follows the lines of the bike with minimal disruption.

name: H-D Detachables Sideplates
description: Quick Detachable Sissy Bar Sideplates are custom designed to transform your bike from a Sissy Bar-equipped two-up highway cruiser to a stripped-down boulevard custom at the snap of a rotary latch. These sideplates incorporate spring-loaded cam hardware for ease of installation, and are designed and tested to rigorous Harley-Davidson™ standards.
details: Fits '04-later XL models (except '16-later XL1200CX). All models require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit (see docking hardware matrix).  Docking hardware is original equipment on XL1200T models.

name: Chrome Softail Passenger Footboard and Mount Kit
description: Add the custom look of chrome.
details: Fits '00-'17 Softail™ models (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTF, FLSTFB, FLSTFBS, FLSTN, FLSTNSE, FLSTS, FLSTSB, FLSTSC, FLSTSE, FXS, FXSBSE, FXCW, FXCWC and FXSTD). '00-'15 FLSTC models require Saddlebag Bracket Relocation Kit P/N 90238-00.

name: H-D Detachables Sissy Bar Upright
description: A sissy bar and passenger backrest pad is the starting point for building a complete touring machine. The backrest provides long-range comfort and support, and adds a feeling of confidence and control for the passenger.
details: Fits '97-'08 Road King™, FLHT, FLHX and FLTR models equipped with required Docking Kits. Fits '06-'08 FLHTC models equipped with H-D™ Detachables™ Tour-Pak™ Rack Kit P/N 53303-07 and Docking Hardware Kit P/N 53803-06.

name: Passenger Sissy Bar Upright
description: Styled to blend with the muscular look of the Dyna™ family, this gloss black upright attaches directly to the Passenger Pillion for a clean look.

name: One-Piece H-D Detachables Tall Sissy Bar Upright
description: The sweeping shape and gloss black finish of this slim solid bar Passenger Upright complements the classic "bobber" look. The one-piece design eliminates separate sideplates for a clean appearance and the stylized upper kick angle mimics the old-school sissy bars of the 50s and 60s.
details: Fits '07-'17 FLSTF, FLSTFB, FLSTFBS, FLSTSB and FLSTSE and '06-'15 FXST, FXSTB, FXSTC and FXSTS models. Requires separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit and may require Turn Signal Relocation Kit. See Docking Hardware Fitment Chart for your application.

name: One-Piece H-D Detachables Sissy Bar
description: Sweeping curves and a sleek gloss black finish add a custom look to this Passenger Sissy Bar. Featuring a slotted base and beefy solid bar upright, this backrest is the perfect complement to the brawler-style Blackline™ model.

name: Rigid Solo Rack

details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models with solo seats (except FLD, FXDF, FXDFSE, FXDL and '10-'17 FXDWG).

name: Styled Backrest Mounting Plate

name: One-Piece H-D Detachables Sissy Bar

name: H-D Detachables Sideplates

Requires separate purchase of appropriate Docking Hardware kit. ’13-'17 FXDB models equipped with a side-mount license plate require License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 67900130. ’13-later FXDB HDI/India configuration requires separate purchase of Docking Hardware and Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800499. Not for use with LED Rear Turn Signal Kit P/N 67800055A or 67800056A.

description: The low-profile aerodynamic styling of the Air Wing Tour-Pak™ Luggage Rack enhances the look of any Razor-Pak, Chopped or King Tour-Pak™ lid. The rich gloss black finished rack draws your eye with its sleek lines, and the engraved Harley-Davidson™ script adds a signature touch.
details: Fits King, Chopped and Razor-Pak Tour-Pak™ carrier's lids. Mounting hole pattern matches Premium Tour-Pak™ Luggage Rack P/N 53665-87.

name: Gloss Black Premium Tour-Pak Latches
description: Add a custom touch to your Tour-Pak™ luggage. Styled to complement available gloss black Premium Tour-Pak™ Hinges, these Original Equipment-style latches are polished and finished in rich gloss black.
details: Fits '88-'13 Touring and Trike models equipped with Razor-Pak, Chopped or King Tour-Pak™ Luggage.

name: Gloss Black Premium Tour-Pak Hinges
description: Upgrade the appearance of your Tour-Pak™ luggage with billet-style premium hinges.

name: EZ Tour-Pak Lid Catch
description: Add the convenience of a self-aligning Tour-Pak™ lid to your Touring bike. Simply close the lid and latch it down.

name: Tour-Pak Lock Cover
description: Add a custom touch to your Tour-Pak™ lock with the Tour-Pak™ Lock Cover.
details: Fits '88-'13 Touring and Trike models equipped with Razor-Pak, Chopped or King Tour-Pak™ Luggage. Does not fit Premium Tour-Pak™ Latches P/N 53000252 or 53000253.

name: Tour-Pak Lock Cover
description: Add a custom touch to your Tour-Pak™ lock with the Tour-Pak™ Lock Cover.

name: H-D Detachables Two-Up Tour-Pak Mounting Rack
description: Change your riding style in less than 60 seconds. The ultimate in touring flexibility, this H-D™ Detachables™ Two-UpTour-Pak Mounting Rack makes the convenience and protection of a Razor-Pak, Chopped, King, or Leather Tour-Pak™ Luggage System a simple on-and-off proposition.

name: H-D Detachables Solo Tour-Pak Mounting Rack
description: The H-D™ Detachables™ Solo Tour-Pak™ Mounting Rack moves a Razor-Pak, Chopped or King Tour-Pak™ luggage forward to a comfortable back-supporting position.

name: Chrome Tour-Pak Accent Rail
description: Fabricated from highly polished steel tubing, these premium quality chrome-plated Accent Rails frame the wrap-around Tour-Pak™ carrier's lights for a custom look.
details: Fits '14-later FLHTCU, FLHTCUL, FLHTK, FLHTKL, FLTRK, FLTRU, FLHTCUTG, FLTRXSE and models equipped with accessory King Tour-Pak™ and LED Wrap-Around Light. Does not fit CVO™ FLHTKSE or FLTRUSE models.

name: Retractable Trunk Door Tether
description: Adds the convenience of a Retractable Tether to your Trike trunk door.

name: Tour-Pak Spoiler LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit for Tour-Pak™ Spoilers, this fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.

name: Tour-Pak Spoiler LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit for Tour-Pak™ Spoilers, this fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Trike models equipped with a Tour-Pak™ Spoiler Kit. FLHT, FLHX, FLHXS, FLTRX, FLTRK, and FLTRXS models require separate purchase of Wiring Harness P/N 69201157. Does not fit HDI models.

name: Stealth Tour-Pak Luggage Rack
description: Cantilevered aerodynamic rails appear to float above the center spar, imparting a lighter-than-air profile.
details: Fits King, Chopped and Razor-Pak Tour-Pak™ carrier lids. Does not fit with Color-Matched Tour-Pak™ Spoiler kits.

name: Stealth Tour-Pak Luggage Rack
description: Cantilevered aerodynamic rails appear to float above the center spar, imparting a lighter-than-air profile.

name: Premium Tour-Pak Latches
description: Styled to complement the Premium Tour-Pak™ Hinges, these die-cast latches provide a bold look to your ride.

Optional LED rear and side light kits are available.

name: Sport Detachable Top Case
description: Designed primarily for on-road touring, the Sport Detachable Top Case offers a smooth aesthetic and presents a clean silhouette on the motorcycle. With a gasket in the lid, each piece is waterproof and passes a...

name: Locking Rigid Saddlebags
description: Styled to complement the nostalgic look of the Softail™ Deluxe model, these saddlebags with pleated leather panels are anything but traditional.
details: Fits '05-'17 FLSTN models. Does not fit FLSTNSE. Does not fit with Rear Axle Covers.

name: Harley Hammock Rider Touring Seat
description: This Harley™ Hammock Seat coddles the rider and supports their weight with a wide seating surface and the revolutionary sling-like fabric suspension system.

name: Locking Leather Covered Rigid Saddlebags
description: These saddlebags offer a premium leather look with an extra-durable construction.

name: H-D Detachables Two-Up Tour-Pak Luggage Mounting Rack
description: Designed to be installed and removed in less than 60 seconds, this Tour-Pak™ Rack makes the ultimate accessory in touring flexibility.
details: Fits '00-'05 Softail™ models (except Deuce™), '06 FLST and FLSTF and '06-'17 FLSTC, FLSTN and FLSTSC models. Designed to accept Color-Matched Sport Tour-Pak™ or Leather Tour-Pak™ Luggage System. Requires separate purchase of appropriate Docking Hardware. Some models require the separate purchase of Directional Relocation Kit. Refer to Docking Hardware Chart for specific application. Some EU registration plates may interfere with Tour-Pak™ Rack. Models with rear fender tip trim can be adapted with the separate purchase of License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 60095-00A. Models equipped with H-D™ Detachables™ Saddlebag Kit P/N 88237-07 also require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 54245-10.

name: Passenger Footboard Support Kit
description: Add the comfort and convenience of passenger footboards to your Touring motorcycle.
details: Fits '93-later Touring and Trike models.

name: H-D Detachables Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of Hard Saddlebags on specific models equipped with H-D™ Detachables™ sissy bar uprights or racks.

name: Tour-Pak Luggage- Road King Classic Leather Styling
description: Add cross-county luggage capacity to your ride with accessory Tour-Pak™ Luggage. A cavernous interior will hold one full-face helmet or two half helmets.

name: Tour-Pak Luggage- Leather Heritage Softail Classic Styling
description: Add cross-county luggage capacity to your ride with accessory Tour-Pak™ Luggage.

name: H-D Detachables Tour-Pak Luggage Conversion Kit
description: Transform your Electra Glide™ model for around town cruising. This kit includes everything needed to convert the rigid-mount Tour-Pak™ to an easy on-and-off detachable version.
details: Fits '09-'13 FLHTC, FLHTCU, FLHTK and FLTRU models. FLHTCU and FLHTK require separate purchase of Wiring Harness P/N 70032-09. FLTRU models require separate purchase of Wiring Harness P/N 69200181.

name: Tour-Pak Lid Organizer
description: A true innovation in storage convenience and efficiency, this ingenious lid organizer helps keep smaller items conveniently located under your Tour-Pak™ lid for easy access.
details: Fits '93-'13 Touring and Trike models equipped with a King, Ultra, Chopped or Razor-Pak Tour-Pak™. Does not fit '08-later CVO™ Ultra models with Power Locks, or models equipped with Tour-Pak™ Spoiler Kit P/N 53149-series, Tour-Pak™ Light P/N 54302-98A, Mini Tour-PakLid Rack P/N 53100-96 or Contoured Tour-Pak™ Luggage Rack P/N 79148-06A.

name: Harley-Davidson Detachable Solo Tour-Pak Mounting Rack
description: The Solo Tour-Pak™ Rack moves a Razor-Pak, Chopped or King Tour-Pak™ forward to a comfortable back supporting position.
details: Fits ’09-’13 FLHR, FLHRC, FLHT, FLHX, FLHXSE, FLTR, FLTRX and FLTRXSE, ’13 FLHRSE and ’09 FLTRSE models. Requires separate purchase of 2-Point or 4-Point Docking Hardware Kit. FLHX and FLTR models require separate purchase of Tour-Pak Antenna Relocation Kit P/N 76556-09. ’13 FLHRSE, ’10-’12 FLHXSE, ’09 FLTRSE and ’12-’13 FLTRXSE models require separate purchase of Hidden Antenna Kit P/N 76000266.

name: H-D Detachables Two-Up Tour-Pak Mounting Rack
description: Change your riding style in less than 60 seconds. The ultimate in touring flexibility, this Tour-Pak™ Rack makes the convenience and protection of a Razor-Pak, Chopped, King, or Leather Tour-Pak™ Luggage System a simple on-and-off proposition.
details: Fits '97-'08 Road King™, FLHT, FLHX and FLTR models equipped with required docking hardware. FLTR and FLHX models require Antenna Relocation Kit P/N 76326-00A. Does not fit with Layback License Plate Mounting Kit P/N 53385-00. Some EU registration plates may interfere with Tour-Pak™ Rack. Models with rear fender tip trim can be adapted with the separate purchase of License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 60095-00A.

name: Super Reach Seat
description: Get a little bit closer. Super Reach forward position seats are designed to move riders with a shorter inseam even closer to the controls and to bring the legs about 1" closer together so that your feet rest firmly on the pavement.
details: Fits '09-'13 Touring and Trike models. Also fits '14-later Touring models not equipped with Tour-Pak™ luggage. Installation on '12-later CVO™ models requires removal of fender trim strips. Seat width 13.0"  passenger pillion width 12.0".

name: Reach Seat
description: Designed to position riders with a shorter inseam closer to the ground, Reach™ Seats are shaped to place the rider in a comfortable and confident relationship to the hand and foot controls.

name: Super Reduced Reach Solo Seat
description: Get a little bit closer. Super Reduced Reach forward position seats are designed to move riders with a shorter inseam even closer to the controls and to bring the legs about 1" closer together so that your feet rest firmly on the pavement.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models. Seat width 10.5".

name: Signature Series Rider Seat with Backrest
description: A perfect combination of foam density and shape has created our most comfortable seat for long haul touring. Both rider and passenger will be comfortable riding to Sturgis and back with the wide seating areas.

name: Performance Suspension Kit
description: Fully-adjustable light-weight suspension system features Showa's new Big Piston Front fork (BPF) design, which eliminates many of the internal components used in a cartridge-type fork, simplifying construction and resulting in lighter overall fork weight.

name: Profile Low Touring Front Lowering Kit
description: Place the rider's feet firmly on the ground. This kit utilizes components designed to provide a 1" decrease in ride height.
details: Fits '09-'13 Touring models (except FLHR, FLHRC, FLHRSE, FLHXSE, FLTRSE and FLTRXSE). Does not fit Trike models. Must only be installed on vehicles equipped with Profile Low Touring Shocks P/N 54635-09 or Premium Ride Low Shocks P/N 54000091. Can be installed on FLHX and FLTRX models with Original Equipment rear shocks.

name: Touring Suspension Air Pump
description: This pump was designed to allow safe and simple adjustment of the front and rear air suspension on Touring motorcycles. Unlike a bicycle pump or a fuel station air hose, the hand operated pump with controllable "micro bleed" valve allows precise adjustment to air volume, and the "no loss" air connector maintains shock pressure when the fitting is removed.

name: Profile Low Touring Shocks
description: Lower the seat height of your Touring model without compromising the ride. The Profile Low Touring Shocks were made for a more comfortable ride.
details: Fits '97-'08 Touring models (except '07-'08 FLHRSE). Does not lower FLHRS or FLHX models.

name: Profile Low Touring Shocks
description: Lower the seat height of your Touring model without compromising the ride.

name: Chrome Profile Low Rear Suspension
description: This suspension lowers the seat height approximately .75" while preserving ride quality. Spring and damping rates are tailored for Softail™ models to ensure a controlled ride.
details: Fits '00-'17 FLSTC, FLSTB, FLSTF, FLSTS, FXST, FXSTB, FXSTC and FXSTS models. Also fits '10-'17 Fat Boy™ Special model in UK, Europe, Brazil, and select International markets that are factory-equipped with standard-height rear suspension.

name: Two-Up Profile Low Rear Shock Kit
description: These heavy-duty shocks are tuned for the touring rider carrying a passenger or loaded saddlebags.
details: Fits '07-'15 XL883L, XL883N, XL1200N, XL1200V, XL1200X and '11-'15 XL1200C models.

name: Profile Low Front Suspension
description: Designed by Harley-Davidson™ to lower the front fork approximately 1.0" while preserving ride quality.

name: Michelin Scorcher Tire Series - 130/90B16 Blackwall - 16 in. Front
description: The Scorcher is the first Michelin™ - Harley-Davidson™ co-branded tire, with a bold Harley-Davidson™ script on the sidewall. Featuring an exceptional combination of durability, comfort and handling, the Scorcher "11" and Scorcher "31" are factory-installed on many models, and can be installed as a replacement tire on other specified models.

name: Anarchy 5-Spoke 18 in. Front Wheel
description: The 5 beefy spokes of this custom wheel dramatically change the look of your Touring model or Trike.
details: Fits '09-later Touring (except models equipped with TPMS & '12-later CVO™), FLHTCUTG and '10-'11 FLHXXX models. Requires separate purchase of (2) Open Floating Brake Rotors P/N 41500012A (polished) or 44553-06A (raw).

name: Agitator 19 in. Front Wheel
description: Get ready to stir things up. The 7 forward-facing spokes of these Agitator Wheels dig deep into the soul for maximum custom impact.

name: Dunlop Tire Series - D401 150/80B16 Wide Whitewall - 16 in. Rear
description: Since 1984, Dunlop™ Tires has provided Original Equipment and service replacement tires for Harley-Davidson™ Motorcycles. Dunlop™ is recognized as the world-leader in motorcycle tire design, engineering and manufacturing excellence.
details: Fits '04-later XL models (except XL 1200XS, XL1200NS, XL1200CX, XL1200X, XL1200V, XR1200/X, XL1200T and '11-later XL883L and XL1200C).

name: Dunlop Tire Series - D401 100/90-19 Wide Whitewall - 19 in. Front
description: Since 1984, Dunlop™ Tires has provided Original Equipment and service replacement tires for Harley-Davidson™ Motorcycles. Dunlop™ is recognized as the world-leader in motorcycle tire design, engineering and manufacturing excellence.
details: Fits '04-later XL models (except XL1200XS, XL1200NS, XL Custom, XL1200CX, XL1200T, XL1200X, XL1200V, XR1200™/X or ’11-later XL883L) and '06-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD, FXDF, FXDFSE, FXDSE and '10-'17 FXDWG).

name: Edge Cut Hand Control Lever Kit
description: Styled to complement the Edge Cut components, these slotted hand levers feature a cut back finish that looks great against black or chrome hand controls.

name: Sportster Drag Bar
description: Nothing says minimalist like a classically simple drag bar.
details: Fits '07-later XL models with 2.2 or 3.3 gallon fuel tank.  Does not fit XL883C, XL883R, XL1200C, XL1200L, XL1200R, XL1200T, '11-later XL883L, or models equipped with 4.5 gallon large capacity fuel tank. All models require separate purchase of additional components.

name: Chizeled Satin Black Handlebar
description: Achieve ultimate cutting-edge style. The Chizeled Bar features the edgy profile of the classic Z bar, and combines the hands-up feel of a mini-ape with the narrow width of a drag bar. The result? A classic chopper attitude.

name: FXSB Softail Reach Handlebar
description: Shaped to provide the ideal balance of pull back and width.

name: Chizeled Chrome Handlebar
description: Achieve ultimate cutting-edge style. The Chizeled Bar features the edgy profile of the classic Z bar, and combines the hands-up feel of a mini-ape with the narrow width of a drag bar. The result? A classic chopper attitude.
details: Fits '07-later XL883L, XL883N, XL1200CX, XL1200L, XL1200N, XL1200NS, XL1200T,  XL1200V, XL1200X and XL1200XS models. Also fits '06-'17 FXDB models with Original Equipment Handlebar P/N 58079-93. Does not fit with Heated Hand Grips. XL models require separate purchase of additional components.

name: Reach Handlebar
description: This handlebar is designed to bring the controls 2 inches closer to the rider for increased comfort.

name: Drag Handlebar - Satin Black
description: Nothing says minimalist like a classically simple drag bar. Shaped to give the Harley-Davidson™ Street model an aggressive riding profile.
details: Fits '15-later XG models (except XG750A). All models require separate purchase of additonal installation components. ABS models require separate purchase of Front Brake Line P/N 41800610.

name: Drag Handlebar - Chrome
description: Nothing says minimalist like a classically simple drag bar. Shaped to give the Harley-Davidson™ Street model an aggressive riding profile.
details: Fits '15-later XG models (except XG750A). All models require separate purchase of additonal installation components. ABS models require separate purchase of Front Brake Line P/N 41800610.

name: Fat Mini-Ape Handlebar
description: Give your ride a touch of old school style with this 1-1/4" Fat Ape Handlebar.
details: Fits '13-'17 FXSB models. Kit includes chrome-plated handlebar riser and clamp with gauge mount. Separate purchase of additional components required.  Does not fit CVO™ models.

name: Road King Handlebar Cover For 1.25 in. Ape Handlebars
description: Required for installation of 12" and 16" Fat Ape Handlebars on Road King™ models.
details: Fits '14-later FLHR, FLHRC and FLHRXS models equipped with handlebars P/N 56942-10B, 55857-10B, 56832-04C, 55859-10B.  Does not fit FLHRSE models.

name: Road King Handlebar Cover For 1.25 in. Ape Handlebars
description: Required for installation of 12" and 16" Fat Ape Handlebars on Road King™ models.
details: Fits '14-later FLHR, FLHRC and FLHRXS models equipped with handlebars P/N 56942-10B, 55857-10B, 56832-04C, 55859-10B.  Does not fit FLHRSE models.

name: Sportster Clubman Handlebar
description: Be prepared to attract a lot of attention. Designed to replicate the look and posture of clip-on bars, this 1" Clubman handlebar is shaped to drop the grips below the top triple tree to provide a tank-hugging aggressive riding position.
details: Fits '10-later XL models (except '11-later XL883L). Does not fit with Heated Hand Grips. All models require separate purchase of additional installation components.

name: Iron 883 Handlebar
description: Add an edgy touch to your Sportster™ model. Featuring the same shape, rise and pullback of the Iron 883™ Original Equipment stainless pull back handlebar.
details: Fits '10-later XL883L, XL1200C, XL1200NS, XL1200T, XL1200V and XL1200XS models.  Installation requires separate purchase of additional components. Original Equipment on XL883N and XL1200X models.

name: Road King Fat Handlebar - Chrome
description: Similar to Original Equipment handlebar on the '14 CVO™ Road King™ model, this beefy 1-1/4" handlebar places the rider in a laid-back riding posture.
details: Fits '14-later Road King™ and '17-later Road King™ Special models. All models require separate purchase of additional components for installation.

name: Fat Chizeled Handlebar - Chrome
description: Achieve ultimate cutting edge style. The Chizeled Bar features the edgy profile of the classic Z bar and combines the hands-up feel of a mini-ape with the narrow width of a drag bar. The result? A classic chopper attitude, and a comfortable hand and wrist position for tall riders.
details: Fits '12-'16 FLD, '13-'17 FXDB, '16-'17 FXDLS, and '00-'17 FLS, FLSS, FLSTC, FLSTF, FLSTFB, FLSTFBS, FLSTN, FXST, FXSTB, FXSTC and '18-later Softail™ models (except FXBR, FXBRS, FXFB, FXFBS and FXLRS). All models require separate purchase of additional installation components.  Does not fit with stock heated grips or accessory Black Rubber Heated Hand Grips P/N 56100034.

name: Chizeled Lo Handlebar - Chrome
description: With a low profile 4" rise and a narrow lane-splitting 27" width, this compact Z-bar bar will give your bike a classic West Coast look.

name: Chizeled Lo Handlebar - Gloss Black
description: With a low profile 4" rise and a narrow lane-splitting 27" width, this compact Z-bar bar will give your bike a classic West Coast look.
details: Fits '07-later XL883L, XL883N, XL1200CX, XL1200L, XL1200N, XL1200NS, XL1200T, XL1200V, XL1200X, XL1200XS, and '06-'17 FXDB models. Does not fit with Heated Hand Grips. All models require separate purchase of additional components.

name: Road Glide Chizeled Handlebar - Chrome
description: Bring cutting edge style to your custom bagger. The Batwing Chizeled Bar combines the rise of a 14" mini-ape with the edgy profile of the classic “Z" bar and the wrist position of a drag bar. The result? An aggressive hands-in-the-air riding posture.
details: Fits '15-later FLTRU, FLTRX and FLTRXS models. Does not fit '18-later FLTRXSE or models equipped with 21" Knockout™ Wheel Kit P/N 43300494 or 43300496. All models require separate purchase of additional components. Does not fit CVO™ models.  Does not fit models with Black Rubber Heated Hand Grip Kit P/N 56100034.

name: Road Glide Chizeled Handlebar - Gloss Black
description: Bring cutting edge style to your custom bagger. The Batwing Chizeled Bar combines the rise of a 14" mini-ape with the edgy profile of the classic “Z" bar and the wrist position of a drag bar. The result? An aggressive hands-in-the-air riding posture.
details: Fits '15-later FLTRU, FLTRX and FLTRXS models. Does not fit '18-later FLTRXSE or models equipped with 21" Knockout™ Wheel Kit P/N 43300494 or 43300496. All models require separate purchase of additional components. Does not fit CVO™ models.  Does not fit models with Black Rubber Heated Hand Grip Kit P/N 56100034.

name: Road Glide Fat Ape Handlebar
description: Hang ’em high. Across town or cross country, this classic-shaped Fat Mini Ape Handlebar adds a touch of old school style to your modern urban bagger.
details: Fits '15-later FLTRX, FLTRXS and FLTRU models. All models require separate purchase of additional components. Does not fit CVO™ models (except '20-later FLTRXSE). Fits with Accessory Heated Grips. Does not fit with the FLHTK Heated Grips (or Black Rubber Heated Hand Grip Kit P/N 56100034).

name: Road Glide Fat Ape Handlebar
description: Hang ’em high. Across town or cross country, this classic-shaped Fat Mini Ape Handlebar adds a touch of old school style to your modern urban bagger.

name: Road Glide Tallboy Handlebar

Fits with Accessory Heated Grips. Compatible with accessory heated grips (except FLHTK Heated Grips or Black Rubber Heated Hand Grips P/N 56100034)

name: Road Glide Tallboy Handlebar
description: This 1.25" diameter bar features an optimized ergonomic design for taller and long-limbed riders.

Fits with Accessory Heated Grips. Compatible with accessory heated grips (except FLHTK Heated Grips or Black Rubber Heated Hand Grips P/N 56100034)

name: Extreme Reach Handlebar
description: Extensively tested with a panel of riders between 5'-0" to 5'-5" tall, this Extreme Reach™ Handlebar and recommended riser combination was proven to be the most ergonomically pleasing handlebar for many Dyna™ and Softail™ models.

name: Chizeled Lo Handlebar - Chrome
description: With a low 9.00" rise and a flat drag-bar hand position, this compact Z-bar will place the rider into an aggressive, tucked-in riding posture.
details: Fits '15-later FLTRX and FLTRXS models. Does not fit '18-later FLTRXSE or models equipped with 21" Knockout™ Wheel Kit P/N 43300494 or 43300496. All models require separate purchase of additional components. Does not fit CVO™ models.  Compatible with accessory heated grips (except FLHTK Heated Grips or Black Rubber Heated Hand Grips P/N 56100034)

name: Chizeled Lo Handlebar - Gloss Black
description: With a low 9.00" rise and a flat drag-bar hand position, this compact Z-bar will place the rider into an aggressive, tucked-in riding posture.

All models require separate purchase of additional components. Does not fit CVO™ models.  Compatible with accessory heated grips (except FLHTK Heated Grips or Black Rubber Heated Hand Grips P/N 56100034)

name: Hollywood Handlebar - Gloss Black
description: Original Equipment on the Softail™ Slim model, this traditional Hollywood-styled handlebar combines the laid-back riding attitude of the '40s with a shape that's perfect for today's new school stripped-down bobbers.

name: Sportster Tallboy Handlebar - Chrome
description: Ergonomically designed and tested by a panel of riders from 5'11" to 6'4", this 1.0" Tallboy™ handlebar enables long-armed riders to more comfortably fit and maneuver a compact Sportster™ model.

name: Sportster Tallboy Handlebar - Gloss Black
description: Ergonomically designed and tested by a panel of riders from 5'11" to 6'4", this 1.0" Tallboy™ handlebar enables long-armed riders to more comfortably fit and maneuver a compact Sportster™ model.

name: Batwing Reach Handlebar
description: The Batwing Reach™ Handlebar is shaped to provide all-day riding comfort for smaller stature riders. The Reach handlebar was ergonomically designed to provide the ideal combination of shoulder position, elbow bend and wrist angle.

name: Batwing Reach Handlebar
description: The Batwing Reach™ Handlebar is shaped to provide all-day riding comfort for smaller stature riders. The Reach handlebar was ergonomically designed to provide the ideal combination of shoulder position, elbow bend and wrist angle.

name: Batwing Tallboy Handlebar
description: The Batwing Tallboy™ Handlebar is shaped to provide a tall rider with the ideal combination of shoulder, elbow and wrist position for a long day in the saddle.

name: Batwing Tallboy Handlebar
description: The Batwing Tallboy™ Handlebar is shaped to provide a tall rider with the ideal combination of shoulder, elbow and wrist position for a long day in the saddle.

name: Clip-On Handlebar Kit - 39mm Fork
description: Mounted on the fork tubes below the upper triple tree, these Clip-On Handlebars place the rider in a low and aggressive tank-hugging riding posture. Ideal for carving corners and splitting lanes, these Clip-On bars narrow the overall width of the bike and keep the rider tightly tucked into the machine for a "one-with-the-bike" feeling.
details: Fits '14-later XL883N, XL1200C, XL1200NS and '07-'15 XL1200X models with 39mm forks. Does not fit with Heated Hand Grips. Not compatible with Headlamp Visor P/N 68129-97 or 68129-98DH. All models may require separate purchase of additional components. 1200X models require separate purchase of Round Bar End or high-mounted stem mirrors.

name: Clip-On Handlebar Kit - 49mm Fork
description: Mounted on the fork tubes below the upper triple tree, these Clip-On Handlebars place the rider in a low and aggressive tank-hugging riding posture. Ideal for carving corners and splitting lanes, these Clip-On bars narrow the overall width of the bike and keep the rider tightly tucked into the machine for a "one-with-the-bike" feeling.

details: Fits '14-later XL1200X and XL1200XS models.

name: Fat Reach Handlebar - 1.25 in. - Chrome
description: Slammed and styled for a low-profile look, this 1.25" handlebar places the hand controls closer to the rider for an optimized elbow bend and wrist position, offering improved confidence and long-range comfort for shorter-armed riders.

name: Fat Reach Handlebar - 1.25 in. - Gloss Black
description: Slammed and styled for a low-profile look, this 1.25" handlebar places the hand controls closer to the rider for an optimized elbow bend and wrist position, offering improved confidence and long-range comfort for shorter-armed riders.

name: Reach Handlebar - 1.0 in. - Chrome

name: Tallboy Handlebar - 1.0 in. - Chrome

Shaped to provide the ideal balance of rise and width, this bar places the hands in a neutral position and stretches the arms to reduce the bend at the elbow.

description: Big and beefy in the chopper tradition, this 1-1/4" Mini-Ape Handlebar is the perfect finish to an "old school" ride.

description: Complete the transition to the dark side. Elegant satin-finished handlebar retains the comfortable contour of the Original Equipment bar and complements the black finished hand controls and mirrors.

name: Softail Slim Pull Back Riser Kit
description: Ideal for riders with a short reach or for those that prefer an upright riding position, these curved risers and the matching handlebar clamp are shaped to put the Original Equipment Softail™ Slim handlebar closer to the rider
details: Fits most '12-'17 FLS and FLSS and '18-later FLSL models.  '15-'17 FLS and FLSS models equipped with ABS brakes require separate purchase of Brake Line P/N 41800300.  Also fits most 1.0" diameter handlebars with separate purchase of additional components. Does not fit Springer™ models. Riser height 4.5".

name: Handlebar Riser Spacer Kit
description: Required for installation of Sportster™ Clubman, Drag, Chizeled and Chizeled Lo Handlebars on Sportster™ XL1200X models.

name: Hand Grip End Caps
description: These smooth End Caps fill the open end of the Diamond Black Bar End Mirror Hand Grips if you remove the mirrors or select to use only a single mirror.
details: Fits models equipped with Diamond Black Hand Grips P/N 56100199 and 56100202.

name: Fat Handlebar Riser Kit
description: Designed to enable the installation of a 1.25” handlebar on models originally equipped with a 1.0” bar.
details: Fits '18-later FLDE, FLFB, FLFBS, FLHC, FLHCS, FLSB, FLSL, and FXLR models.

name: Fat Handlebar Riser Kit
description: Designed to enable the installation of a 1.25” handlebar on models originally equipped with a 1.0” bar.

name: Softail Slim Pull Back Riser Kit
description: Ideal for riders with a short reach or for those that prefer an upright riding position, these curved risers and the matching handlebar clamp are shaped to put the Original Equipment Softail Slim handlebar closer to the rider.

name: Handlebar Clamp and Riser Kit
description: Go for a total blackout and replace your Original Equipment Riser.

name: Handlebar Riser and Clamp Kit
description: This straight riser changes the riding position, placing your hands and arms higher.

name: 1 in. Gauge Clamp Kit
description: Designed for motorcycles equipped with the standard digital gauge in the riser.
details: Fits '18-later FXBB and '20-later FXST models equipped with Tall Riser Kit P/N 55800852.

name: 1.25 in. Gauge Clamp Kit

details: Fits '20-later FXST and 18-later FXBB, FXBR, FXBRS and FXDRS models equipped with Tall Riser Kit P/N 55800854.

name: 1.25 in. Handlebar Top Clamp Kit
description: Designed for motorcycles not equipped with the standard digital gauge in the riser.
details: Fits '18-later FLFB, FLFBS, FLSL, FXFB, FXFBS, FXLR and FXLRS, and '14-later Road King models equipped with Tall Riser Kit P/N 55800854.

name: 1 in. Handlebar Top Clamp Kit
description: Designed for motorcycles not equipped with the standard digital gauge in the riser.
details: Fits '18-later FXLR, FLSL, '20-later FXLRS and '14-later Road King models equipped with tall riser kit 55800852.

name: Tall Risers
description: Gain comfort and control with these Tall Risers, which move the handlebar up and back 2 inches compared to the stock riser.
details: Fits '21-later RA1250 and RA1250S models.

name: Hand Wind Deflectors
description: Add protection from the elements. These lightweight Hand Wind Deflectors help keep wind, insects, small stones and trail-side branches from impacting the rider’s hands and provide added comfort in cool weather.
details: Fits ’21-later RA1250.  Stock on RA1250S.

name: Batwing Reach Handlebar
description: These high quality, polished stainless steel handlebars are designed to bring the controls two inches closer to the rider for increased comfort.

name: Road King / Road Glide Tallboy Handlebar
description: Designed to provide extra comfort for the Road King™ rider, this chrome bar is 4-1/2 inches higher and 2 inches narrower than the stock handlebar found on '96-99 Road King™ models and 3-1/2 inches higher and 1-1/2 inches narrower than stock handlebar on '00-'01 Road King™ models.

name: Beach Handlebar
description: These beefy 1-1/4" bars show off your bike in style!

name: Street Slammer Bar
description: Comfort and attitude in one. This Street Slammer drag bar with 7" integrated risers offers a stylish alternative to separate curved risers, bars and handlebar clamp combinations, and reduces the stretch required to reach traditional straight bars.
details: Fits '12-'16 FLD, '06-'17 FXDB, '08-'17 FXDF, '01-'05 FXDL, '16-'17 FXDLS, '99-'17 FXDWG, '00-'17 FLS, FLSS, FLSTC, FLSTF, FLSTFB, FLSTFBS, FLSTN, FXST, FXSTB, FXSTC and FXSTD, '18-later Softail™ (except FXBB, FXFB, FXFBS, FXBR, FXBRS, FXLRS and FXST) and '03-'13 FLHR and FLHRC models. All models require separate purchase of additional installation components. Does not fit Road King™ models equipped with cruise control, '08 ABS-equipped models, Heated Hand Grips, Hydraulic Clutch Kits, Handlebar Mounted Gauges, Road Tech™ Radio, Softail™ Nacelle Kit or Sidecar-equipped models.

name: Fat Drag Handlebar

details: Fits '18-later Softail models (except FLDE, FLHC, FLHCS, FLSB, FLSL, FXLR and FXLRS), '17 FXDB, '08-'17 FXDF, '10-'17 FXDWG, '10-'17 FLSTF and FLSTFB, '15 FXST and '10 FXSTB models. All models require separate purchase of additional components.

description: Add a splash of chrome to the "bat wing" inner fairing. These Fairing-Mount Mirrors de-clutter the handlebar and add a contemporary aero style to your ride.

name: Chrome Mirror Extension Kit
description: The Mirror Extension Kit improves visibility to the rear of your bike by repositioning mirrors outward approximately 2" and upward 1", clearing your field of view and allowing you to see past your shoulders.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ and  '08-'14 Softail™ models.

name: Black Mirror Extension Kit
description: The Mirror Extension Kit improves visibility to the rear of your bike by repositioning mirrors outward approximately 2" and upward 1", clearing your field of view and allowing you to see past your shoulders.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ and  '08-'14 Softail™ models.

name: Black Fairing Mount Mirrors
description: Fairing Mount Mirrors offer a truly innovative look from the traditional handlebar-mounted mirrors. Mounting just inside the inner fairing, the molded plastic mirror housings complement the contours of the batwing fairing.

name: Chrome Fairing Mount Mirrors
description: Add a splash of chrome to the "bat wing" inner fairing. These Fairing-Mount Mirrors de-clutter the handlebar and add a contemporary aero style to your ride.

details: Fits '14-later Touring models (except Road King and Road Glide) and Trike models (except FLRT).

name: Edge Cut Dome Mirrors
description: Keep an eye on everything, while everyone keeps an eye on you. These compact billet mirrors feature glass-smooth domed shells and wet-look black surfaces to reflect a new contemporary style.

name: Chrome Tapered Fairing Mount Mirrors
description: Reflect your personal style. These slim forged aluminum Fairing Mount Mirrors minimize the profile at the edges of the Batwing Fairing for a clean custom look.

name: Edge Cut Tapered Fairing Mount Mirrors
description: Reflect your personal style. These slim forged aluminum Fairing Mount Mirrors minimize the profile at the edges of the Batwing Fairing for a clean custom look.
details: Fits '14-later Electra Glide™, Street Glide™, Ultra Limited™ and Tri Glide™ models.

name: Profile Custom Mirrors
description: These billet-style mirror feature a low-profile swept back design with a shape that tucks in close to the hand controls.

name: Dominion Mirrors
description: Express your bold, renegade attitude. The Dominion Collection Mirrors let you set your own styling direction.

name: Dominion Mirrors

details: Fits '82-later models (except VRSCF, XG750A, '14-'16 FLHR, FLHRC and FLHRSE, '11-'13 FLHTCUSE, '14-later FLHTKSE and '18-later FLTRXSE). Does not fit XL1200X models with mirrors  mounted below the handlebar.

name: Wild One Mirrors
description: Add daring, raw-and-rugged style with durable billet aluminum Wild One™ Collection accessories. Each is finished in gloss black with bright, machined aluminum highlights, a variety of textures and exposed hardware to communicate power, speed, and performance.

name: Harley-Davidson by Rizoma Mirrors
description: Precision craftsmanship and unmistakable style define this collaborative collection from Harley-Davidson and Rizoma™. Lasered H-D and Rizoma logos on a subdued black on black finish display minimal branding that lets the machined texture and performance aesthetic take the lead. This sleek collection of billet aluminum accessories is the first co-branded collection of its kind designed exclusively for H-D™ motorcycle riders.

name: Empire Mirrors
description: Raise the stakes. Deep grooves add eye-catching depth and detail to the rich black anodized finish on this complete collection of hand and foot controls. Executed in durable cast and billet aluminum, the Black Empire™ Collection adds captivating custom detail that complements other black and machine cut accessories.
details: Fits '82-later models (except VRSCF, XG750A, '14-'16 FLHR, FLHRC and FLHRSE, '11-'13 FLHTCUSE, '14-later FLHTKSE and '18-later FLTRXSE). Does not fit XL1200X with mirrors  mounted below the handlebar and Revolution Max models.

name: Empire Mirrors

details: Fits '82-later models (except VRSCF, XG750A, '14-'16 FLHR, FLHRC and FLHRSE, '11-'13 FLHTCUSE, '14-later FLHTKSE and '18-later FLTRXSE). Does not fit XL1200X with mirrors  mounted below the handlebar and Revolution Max models.

details: Fits '09-later Electra Glide™, Street Glide™ and Ultra Limited™ models (except CVO™). Does not fit Trike models. All models require separate purchase of additional components.

name: Straight Handlebar Riser Kit
description: These chrome-plated Risers provide a comfortable riding position for those who like the shape, width, and hand position of their current 1'' handlebar, but wish it was a closer. For an ergonomically-friendly ride, these risers can be combined with a Harley-Davidson™ Reduced Reach forward-position seat and Profile Low suspension components to reduce arm stretch and to plant the feet firmly on the ground.
details: Fits most 1.0" handlebars. Does not fit FXBB, FXBR, FXBRS, FXST and Springer™ models. Installation may require separate purchase of handlebar clamp. Installation also may affect fitment of handlebar-mounted instruments. See your dealer for details.

name: Curved Handlebar Riser Kit

details: Fits most 1.0" handlebars. Does not fit FXBB, FXBR, FXBRS, FXST and Springer™ models. Installation may require separate purchase of handlebar clamp. Installation also may affect fitment of handlebar-mounted instruments. See your dealer for details.

The soft touch cross-hatched rubber surface feels good against both gloved and bare skin, and the "thicker in the middle" profile forms a natural fit with your closed fist.

Defined by sweeping curves, this complete assortment of hand and foot controls feature a rich tuxedo black finish that is the perfect complement to your sinister ride. The design incorporates a field of textured black rubber surrounded with deep longitudinal lines, and is finished with a contemporary H-D™ logo. The complete Defiance Collection sets a new rebellious direction in customizing.

name: Airflow Heated Hand Grips
description: Keep comfortable on cool morning or frigid night rides. These thermostatically controlled grips feature variable heat settings controlled with a military grade resistor, and use automatic temperature monitoring to adjust to ambient temperatures. Grips have been thermally mapped to provide a more uniform heat and are designed to achieve a maximum operating temperature approximately 20° Fahrenheit warmer than previous accessory heated grips for added warmth during cold rides.

name: Streamliner Heated Hand Grips
description: Grips are thermally mapped to provide a more evenly dispersed and comfortable heat.

name: Contoured Chrome and Rubber Heated Hand Grips
description: Keep comfortable on those cool morning or frigid night rides. Warm hands have a major impact on overall body comfort, and sometimes, gloves just aren't enough.

'18-later Softail and '17-later Touring and Trike models require Electrical Connection Kit P/N 69201599A. Does not fit ’08-’13 models with internally wired handlebars. The power wires for these grips must be wired external of the handlebar. See accessory handlebars for specific heated hand grip exclusions.

name: Wounded Warrior Project Flag Kit
description: Raise the flag and salute our returning veterans who incurred service-connected injuries or illness. Harley-Davidson™ will donate 10% of the manufacturer’s suggested retail price of this item to Wounded Warrior Project (WWP). Harley-Davidson™’s commitment to WWP is part of Harley-Davidson™’s Operation Personal Freedom Campaign to improve the lives of servicemen and women who are living with post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) and help more veterans experience the freedom and of the open road.
