The light pipe outer “signature” ring adds visibility and unique styling, while brilliant center LED elements flash with an eye-catching signal. Easy plug-and-play installation to Original Equipment signal housing takes less than five minutes.
details: Fits '14-later CVO models equipped with LED Bullet Turn Signals (except models with plastic bullet turn signals).

name: Rear Signature LED Turn Signal Assembly
description: LED Turn Signals deliver modern signature style and function that improves rider conspicuity to surrounding traffic. The light pipe outer “signature” ring adds visibility and unique styling, while brilliant center LED elements flash with an eye-catching signal.
details: Fits '18-later Softail models equipped with bullet turn signals for HDI Configuration (except models with plastic bullet turn signals).

name: Rear Signature LED Turn Signal Assembly
description: LED Turn Signals deliver modern signature style and function that improves rider conspicuity to surrounding traffic. The light pipe outer “signature” ring adds visibility and unique styling, while brilliant center LED elements flash with an eye-catching signal.
details: Fits '18-later Softail models equipped with bullet turn signals for HDI Configuration (except models with plastic bullet turn signals).

name: Rear Signature LED Turn Signal Inserts
description: LED Turn Signals deliver modern signature style and function that improves rider conspicuity to surrounding traffic. The light pipe outer “signature” ring adds visibility and unique styling, while brilliant center LED elements flash with an eye-catching signal. Easy plug-and-play installation to Original Equipment signal housing takes less than five minutes.
details: Fits ‘20-later FLHX, FLHXS, FLTRX, FLTRXS, FLHRXS for lightbar applications. For US models only.

name: Chrome Fork Cover Kit
description: Replace your factory-equipped fork covers with these brilliant, triple chrome-plated versions for a custom mirror-like shine.
details: Fits '86-'08 FLST, FLSTF and FLSTFB and '93-'17 FLSTN models. Does not fit FLSTC with Original Equipment light bar or models with Auxiliary Lighting Kit P/N 69287-07 or 68000026.

name: Chrome Fork Cover Accent Strip Kit
description: Sometimes the best ideas come from you, our fellow riders, like this chrome accent strip. This kit is designed to add the ultimate complement to the already popular Chrome Triple Clamp Kit by accenting the sides with beautiful chrome-extruded aluminum strips.
details: Fits '88-'11 FLSTF, FLSTFB and '93-'96 FLSTN models with Chrome Fork Cover Kit P/N 67890-91C or 66440-05. Stock on '12-'17 FLS, FLSTF and FLSTFB.  Does not fit with passing lamps and windshields.

name: Curved License Plate Frame
description: Love the look of your bike but hate the appearance of your state-mandated license plate? This stylish Curved License Plate Frame is shaped to hug the contour of the rear fender, and layback design reduces the "in-your-face" look of the flat, unfinished plate.
details: Fits '05-'17 FLSTN and '05-'07 FLSTSC models.

name: Curved License Plate Frame
description: Love the look of your bike but hate the appearance of your state-mandated license plate? This stylish Curved License Plate Frame is shaped to hug the contour of the rear fender, and layback design reduces the "in-your-face" look of the flat, unfinished plate.

name: Curved License Plate Frame
description: Love the look of your bike but hate the appearance of your state-mandated license plate? This stylish Curved License Plate Frame is shaped to hug the contour of the rear fender, and layback design reduces the "in-your-face" look of the flat, unfinished plate.
details: Fits '09 FLHR, FLHT and FLTR and '06-'08 FLHX models.

name: Curved License Plate Frame
description: Love the look of your bike but hate the appearance of your state-mandated license plate? This stylish Curved License Plate Frame is shaped to hug the contour of the rear fender, and layback design reduces the "in-your-face" look of the flat, unfinished plate.
details: Fits ’10-later FLHRXS, FLHX, FLHXS, FLTRX and FLTRXS models.

name: License Plate Relocation Kit
description: Kit replaces Original Equipment side-mount licenses plate.
details: Fits '11-'17 FLS and FLSS and '11-'13 FXS models with side mount license plate. Required for installation of detachable saddlebags or sissy bar upright.

name: License Plate Relocation Kit
description: Required for installation of saddlebags and detachable uprights.
details: Fits '13-'17 FXDB models equipped with side-mount license plate.

name: Curved License Plate Frame with LED Lighting
description: Dress up the rear of your Street Glide™ or Road Glide™ model and add practical auxiliary lighting at the same time. Designed to replace the Original Equipment black license plate bracket, this curved license plate frame is shaped to hug the contours of the rear fender.
details: Fits ’10-later FLHRXS, FLHX, FLHXS, FLTRX and FLTRXS models.

name: Curved License Plate Frame with LED Lighting
description: Dress up the rear of your Street Glide™ or Road Glide™ model and add practical auxiliary lighting at the same time. Designed to replace the Original Equipment black license plate bracket, this curved license plate frame is shaped to hug the contours of the rear fender.

name: LED King Tour-Pak Brake/Turn/Tail Lamp Kit
description: Add high-mount turn signals, running and brake lamps to your Classic and Ultra King Tour-Pak™ luggage. This wrap-around light kit is equipped with bright, fast acting LED lamps that grab the attention of following traffic.
details: Fits '97-'13 Touring models (except CVO™) equipped with King Tour-Pak™ luggage.

name: Auxiliary Lighting Kit
description: Function and style in one. This Auxiliary Lighting Kit features traditional mounting brackets and a tubular crossbar contoured to accent the headlamp.
details: Fits '00-'17 FLS, FLSS, FLSTF, FLSTFB and FLSTFBS and '06 FLST models.

name: Custom Auxiliary Lighting Bracket Kit
description: Shaped by the wind, these Custom Auxiliary Lighting Brackets blend into the curving contours of the Road King™ nacelle or the Electra Glide™ bat wing-style fairing.
details: Fits '06-'13 FLHX and '10-'11 FLHXXX models. Kit includes passing lamp housings, retaining rings, mounting brackets, auxiliary lamp switch and hardware. Auxiliary Lamp Bulbs and Bullet Turn Signal Kits sold separately.

name: Custom Auxiliary Lighting Bracket Kit
description: Shaped by the wind, these Custom Auxiliary Lighting Brackets blend into the curving contours of the Road King™ nacelle or the Electra Glide™ bat wing-style fairing.

name: Custom Auxiliary Lighting Kit
description: The Custom Auxiliary Lighting Kit follows the contours of the triple tree and headlamp shell for a custom look.

name: Custom Auxiliary Lighting Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of Custom Auxiliary Lighting Kit P/N 68000051 on Fat Boy™ and Slim models.
details: Required for installation of Custom Auxiliary Lighting Kit P/N 68000051 on Fat Boy™ and Softail™ Slim models.

name: LED Light Kit - Luggage Rack
description: This fast acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light when used with the Air Foil Luggage Rack or Air Wing Sissy Bar Upright.
details: Fits Air Foil Luggage Rack P/N 54290-11, 54291-11 and Air Wing Sissy Bar Upright P/N 52300146 and 52300147. Installation requires separate purchase of model-specific Wiring Harness Kit.

name: Red Electra Glo Saddlebag Side Marker Light Kit
description: This wrap-around Side Marker Light Kit adds a splash of light to the lower edge of the color-matched saddlebags.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models with hard saddlebags. Not compatible with CVO™ or other models equipped with Stretched Saddlebags. '14-later models require separate purchase of Electrical Harness Extension P/N 69200722. '17-later models require Electrical Harness Extension P/N 69201599A.

name: Smoked Electra Glo Saddlebag Side Marker Light Kit
description: This wrap-around Side Marker Light Kit adds a splash of light to the lower edge of the color-matched saddlebags.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models with hard saddlebags. Not compatible with CVO™ or other models equipped with Stretched Saddlebags. '14-later models require separate purchase of Electrical Harness Extension P/N 69200722. '17-later models require Electrical Harness Extension P/N 69201599A.

name: Daymaker Reflector LED Fog Lamps - Chrome Housing
description: Compact 2.5” bullet-shaped reflector-optics fog lamps produce a bright white pool of light near the vehicle, and fill in the dark area between the bike and the low-beam pattern.
details: Fits Dyna™, Softail™, Touring and Trike (except FLRT) models equipped with 1.25" diameter engine guards. Also fits '15-later Road Glide™ models with separate purchase of fairing mount Road Glide™ LED Fog Lamp Mount Kit P/N 68000183 or 68000184. Does not fit models with Mustache Engine Guards. Installation requires separate purchase of model-specific Clamp Kit and Wiring Harness Kit.

name: Daymaker Reflector LED Fog Lamps - Gloss Black Housing
description: Compact 2.5” bullet-shaped reflector-optics fog lamps produce a bright white pool of light near the vehicle, and fill in the dark area between the bike and the low-beam pattern.
details: Fits Dyna™, Softail™, Touring and Trike (except FLRT) models equipped with 1.25" diameter engine guards. Also fits '15-later Road Glide™ models with separate purchase of fairing mount Road Glide™ LED Fog Lamp Mount Kit P/N 68000183 or 68000184. Does not fit models with Mustache Engine Guards. Installation requires separate purchase of model-specific Clamp Kit and Wiring Harness Kit.

name: Electra Glo Fairing Edge Light Kit
description: Amplify your ride. The Electra Glo™ Fairing Edge Light Kit adds forward-facing white LED accent lights to the front profile of your bike.

name: Chopped Fender Edge Light Kit
description: Style and function in one. This center-mount auxiliary running and brake light commands the attention of following vehicles.

name: Auxiliary Lighting Kit
description: There's a lot of road on this planet, and these chrome lamps will light the way. Just add the desired lamp kit (sold separately) to complete the installation.

name: LED Light Kit
description: Fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light. The high, center-mount position places the light in the line-of-sight of following vehicles, and the bright, fast-acting red LED lamps get you noticed.
details: Fits ’14-later Touring models equipped with Air Wing H-D™ Detachables™ Luggage Rack P/N 54283-09A and 50300008A and Adjustable Two-Up Luggage Rack P/N 50300044B or 50300076B. Does not fit CVO™ models.

name: Air Wing Rack LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit to the Air Wing Tour-Pak™ Rack, this fast acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Tri Glide™ models equipped with Air Wing Tour-Pak™ Luggage Rack P/N 79179-08 or 53000063.  Also fits '14-later FLHTKSE and '15-later FLTRUSE models with Original Equipment Tour-Pak™ Rack.

name: Air Wing Rack LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit to the Air Wing Tour-Pak™ Rack, this fast acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.

name: Air Wing Rail LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit to the Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rails, this fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models equipped with Air Wing Saddlebag Rails P/N 90200792 or 90200793.

name: Air Wing Rail LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit to the Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rails, this fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models equipped with Air Wing Saddlebag Rails P/N 90200792 or 90200793.

name: Luggage Rack LED Light Kit
description: Fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light. The high, center-mount position places the light in the line-of-sight of following vehicles, and the bright, fast-acting red LED lamps get you noticed.

name: Auxiliary Brake Light/Running Light/Turn Signal Conversion Kit
description: Turn signal module adds an auxiliary brake light and running light function to your existing turn signals for auxiliary rear lighting.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models equipped with Original Equipment flat lens style turn signals.

name: Illuminated Fascia Accent Trim
description: Sweeping chrome trim dresses the trunk fascia for a distinctive yet functional look.

name: LED Fog Lamp Engine Guard Clamp Kit - Gloss Black
description: Required for installation of LED Fog Lamp P/N 68000090 or 68000092 on specific models.

name: LED Fog Lamp Engine Guard Clamp Kit - Gloss Black
description: Required for installation of LED Fog Lamp P/N 68000090 or 68000092 on specific models.
details: Fits Touring and Trike models equipped with 1.25" engine guard and fairing lowers.

name: Tour-Pak Luggage and Saddlebag Interior Light Kit
description: Don't be left in the dark. This bright convenience lamp kit turns night-time into day when you open your Tour-Pak™ or saddlebag.

name: Tour-Pak Luggage Interior Light Kit
description: Don't be left in the dark. This bright convenience lamp kit turns night-time into day when you open your Tour-Pak™.

name: LED Fog Lamp Engine Guard Clamp Kit - Chrome
description: Required for installation of LED Fog Lamp P/N 68000090 or 68000092 on specific models.
details: Fits Touring and Trike models equipped with 1.25" engine guard and fairing lowers.

name: LED Fog Lamp Engine Guard Clamp Kit - Chrome
description: Required for installation of LED Fog Lamp P/N 68000090 or 68000092 on specific models.
details: Fits Dyna™, Softail™, Touring and Trike models equipped with 1.25" engine guards. Does not fit with Mustache Engine Guards. Does not fit models equipped with Original Equipment or accessory fairing lowers.

name: 4 in. Daymaker Projector LED Auxiliary Lamps
description: Cut through the night. Harley-Davidson™ Daymaker™ LED Lamps are brighter and whiter in color and provide a superior light pattern over standard incandescent lamps. Compared to the yellow light of a traditional halogen bulb, the LED lamp produces a daylight color impression that appears more natural to the user.
details: Fits models with a 4" round auxiliary forward lighting. '04-earlier models with auxiliary lamps equipped with spade connectors require separate purchase of Adapter Harness P/N 68355-05 (qty 2).

name: 4 in. Daymaker Projector LED Auxiliary Lamps
description: Cut through the night. Harley-Davidson™ Daymaker™ LED Lamps are brighter and whiter in color and provide a superior light pattern over standard incandescent lamps. Compared to the yellow light of a traditional halogen bulb, the LED lamp produces a daylight color impression that appears more natural to the user.
details: Fits models with a 4" round auxiliary forward lighting. '04-earlier models with auxiliary lamps equipped with spade connectors require separate purchase of Adapter Harness P/N 68355-05 (qty 2).

name: Road Glide LED Fog Lamp Mount Kit - Chrome
description: This elegant Mount Kit replaces the Original Equipment turn signal mount, and positions the Daymaker™ Reflector LED Fog Lamps and turn signals close to the fairing for a custom look.

name: Road Glide LED Fog Lamp Mount Kit - Gloss Black
description: This elegant Mount Kit replaces the Original Equipment turn signal mount, and positions the Daymaker™ Reflector LED Fog Lamps and turn signals close to the fairing for a custom look.
details: Fits '15-later Road Glide™ models with Original Equipment or accessory bullet turn signals. Stock on '20-later FLTRXSE. Requires separate purchase of Daymaker™ Reflector LED Fog Lamps.  May require purchase of OEM switch pack, see dealer for details.

name: Spectra Glo LED Fairing Vent Light
description: Spectra Glo™ Fairing Vent Light fills the Batwing Split Stream Fairing Vent with a subtle glow.
details: Fits '14-later Electra Glide™, Street Glide™, Ultra Limited™, and Tri Glide™ models.

name: Spectra Glo LED Light Pod 6-Lamp Starter Kit
description: Spectra Glo™ Light Pods allow you to install general lighting almost anywhere on the bike. Ground-facing pod placement provides a neon-like pool of light on the pavement, and pods hidden below the tank or behind covers reflects into chrome surfaces to double the splash of color.
details: Fits all models. Requires separate purchase of Controller P/N 68000218. Additional alternate length harnesses are available (sold separately).

name: Spectra Glo LED Light Pod 4-Lamp Expansion Kit
description: Spectra Glo™ Light Pods allow you to install general lighting almost anywhere on the bike. Ground-facing pod placement provides a neon-like pool of light on the pavement, and pods hidden below the tank or behind covers reflects into chrome surfaces to double the splash of color.

name: Spectra Glo LED Lighting Controller Kit
description: The Harley-Davidson™ Spectra Glo™ Lighting System brings ultra-bright LED lighting to your ride, utilizing RGB LED technology to produce over 500 shades of brilliant color. Controllable with a waterproof handheld wireless fob, simply use one button to select one of the 7 base colors, and then dial in the shade you desire. Choose to match the color of your bike, or add a contrasting tone from the wide spectrum of colors. Once you select a color, choose between solid, flash or fade modes with...
details: Required for use with Spectra Glo™ components. '18-later Softail™ and ‘17-later Touring models require purchase of Vehicle Connection Kit P/N 69201526. All other vehicles require purchase of Vehicle Connection Kit P/N 69201636.

name: Spectra Glo Stage II Speaker Illumination Kit
description: The Spectra Glo™ Speaker Illumination Kit adds a diffused neon glow to the Boom!™ Audio speakers.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Trike models with Boom!™ Audio 6.5" Stage II Round Speakers.

name: Spectra Glo Stage I Speaker Illumination Kit
description: The Spectra Glo™ Speaker Illumination Kit adds a diffused neon glow to the Boom!™ Audio speakers.
details: Fits '14-later Touring and Trike models with Boom!™ Audio 6.5" Stage I Round or 5" x 7" Stage I Saddlebag Speakers.

name: Spectra Glo Stage II Saddlebag Speaker Illumination Kit
description: The Spectra Glo™ Speaker Illumination Kit adds a diffused neon glow to the Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag speakers.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models with Boom!™ Audio 5" x 7" Stage II Saddlebag Speakers.

name: 4 in. Daymaker Signature Reflector LED Auxiliary Lamps - Chrome
description: These auxiliary lamps feature reflector bowls that are shaped to add an enhanced pool of light in front of and to the sides of the motorcycle. The LED lamps produce a bright white beam of light, and the modern smooth lens and center-bar reflector design complements the matching Daymaker Signature LED headlamp for a unified look.
details: Fits models with 4" round auxiliary forward lighting. ’04-earlier models with auxiliary lamps equipped with spade connectors require separate purchase of Adapter Harness P/N 68355-05 (Qty 2).

name: 4 in. Daymaker Signature Reflector LED Auxiliary Lamps - Black
description: These auxiliary lamps feature reflector bowls that are shaped to add an enhanced pool of light in front of and to the sides of the motorcycle. The LED lamps produce a bright white beam of light, and the modern smooth lens and center-bar reflector design complements the matching Daymaker Signature LED headlamp for a unified look.

name: Daymaker LED Forward Auxiliary Lights
description: These rugged Daymaker™ LED Forward Auxiliary Lights offer three-way function that will serve the adventure touring rider in any situation. Installed as a pair, each light has a three-beam, four-lens design within durable aluminum housing. In daylight these lights also make the motorcycle more conspicuous to other motorists. The factory-integrated design makes these lights easy to install and a perfect fit and look on the bike.
details: Fits '21-later RA1250 and RA1250S models equipped with Brush Guard and '14-later Touring models. Separate purchase of model-specific installation kit is required.

name: Auxiliary Light Installation Kit
description: Installation kit includes a wiring harness, mounting brackets, and switch pack for installing Daymaker™ LED Forward Auxiliary Lights.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models (except Road Glide models). '14-'16 models require separate purchase of Connector Adapter P/N 69201900.

name: Auxiliary Light Installation Kit
description: Installation kit includes a wiring harness, mounting brackets, and switch pack for installing Daymaker™ LED Forward Auxiliary Lights.
details: Fits '14-later Road Glide models. '14-'16 models require Connector Adapter P/N 69201900.

name: Auxiliary Light Installation Kit
description: Installation kit includes a wiring harness, mounting brackets, and switch pack for installing Daymaker™ LED Forward Auxiliary Lights.
details: Fits '21-later RA1250 and RA1250S models.

name: Tail Light Visor
description: Upgrade the Original Equipment Tri-Bar fender light from a single-mode running light to a dual-mode running and brake light.
details: Fits '73-later models (except VRSC™, XG, XR, XL883N, XL1200CX, XL1200N, XL1200NS, XL1200SX, XL1200V, XL1200X, FXDF, FXDLS, FXDWG, FXWG, FLS, FLSB, FLSS, FLSTN, FLSTS, FLSTSB, FX Softail™, FXSE, FLHX, FLHTCUTG, FLRT, FLTRX and FLTRXS, '11-later XL1200C, '09-'17 FXDB, '14-later FLHXS, FLHRSE and FLHTKSE and '09-later FLHR and FLTR models).

name: Eagle Wing Tail Light Visor
description: Mirror-finish chrome visor dresses the tail light in style.
details: Fits '73-later models (except VRSC™, XG, XR, XL883N, XL1200CX, XL1200N, XL1200NS, XL1200SX, XL1200V, XL1200X, FXDF, FXDLS, FXDWG, FXWG, FLS, FLSB, FLSS, FLSTN, FLSTS, FLSTSB, FX Softail™, FXSE, FLHX, FLHTCUTG, FLRT, FLTRX and FLTRXS, '11-later XL1200C, '09-'17 FXDB, '14-later FLHXS, FLHRSE and FLHTKSE and '09-later FLHR and FLTR models).

name: Gloss Black Fork Cover Accent Strip
description: This strip is designed to add the ultimate complement to the Gloss Black Fork Cover Kit. Finished in matching rich black, this extruded aluminum piece fills the gap between the front and rear covers that is created when the passing lamps are removed.
details: Fits '86-'17 FLS, FLSS, FLST, FLSTC, FLSTF, FLSTFB and FLSTFBS and '93-'96 FLSTN models with Gloss Black Fork Cover Kit P/N 48608-09. (Does not fit with passing lamps or windshields.)

name: LED Light Kit
description: This fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.
details: Fits '09-'13 Touring (except CVO™) models equipped with Air Wing H-D™ Detachables™ Luggage Rack P/N 54283-09 and 50300008 and Adjustable Two-Up Luggage Rack P/N 50300044B and 50300076B.

name: Bar & Shield Rear LED Turn Signals
description: Beautiful signature light for models with Flat Lens turn signals. These Turn Signals feature fast acting, extra bright LED's set in a low-profile die-cast chrome housings.
details: Fits '99-'17 FLSTC and '01-later Touring models equipped with flat lens turn signals.

name: Bar & Shield Rear LED Turn Signals
description: Beautiful signature light for models with Flat Lens turn signals. These Turn Signals feature fast acting, extra bright LEDs set in low-profile die-cast chrome housings.
details: Fits '99-'17 FLSTC and '01-later Touring models equipped with flat lens turn signals.

name: Color-Matched Headlamp Visor
description: Add an element of racy style to stock headlamps with this visor.
details: Fits '95-later XL (except XL883C, XL1200C, XL1200CX, XL1200V, XL1200X and XL1200XS), '82-'94 FXR and FXRS and '95-'05 Dyna™ (except FXDWG and FXDXT) models. Does not fit with Clip-On Handlebar P/N 55800647.

name: Turn Signal Swivel Assembly Kit
description: Add a subtle chrome detail to match your own chrome accessories with this swivel kit.

name: Smooth Horn Cover
description: Add a custom touch to your ride. Styled to complement the Smooth Air Cleaner Cover P/N 29153-07, this compact round horn cover features a mirror- finish.
details: Fits '93-later models with side-mounted horn (except VRSC™ and XG models).

name: Clear Lens with Halogen Bulb Auxiliary Lamp Bulb Kit
description: Enjoy bright balanced light which complements your Halogen Headlight. Distinctive reflective inner domes add new character to your front end.
details: Fits all models with Original Equipment or accessory Auxiliary Lighting Kits (except '14-later Street Glide™, Electra Glide™, Ultra Limited™ and Trike models). Sold in pairs. Does not fit '18-Later Softail™

name: Turn Signal Relocation Kit
description: Kit moves turn signals from rear fender struts to a license bracket-mounted turn signal bar.
details: Fits '09-'17 FXDB models (except models with optional fender strut covers).  Also fits '16-'17 FXDLS models.

name: Air Wing Luggage Rack LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit to the Air Wing Tour-Pak™ Rack, this fast acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light and brake light.
details: Fits '97-'13 Touring models equipped with Air Wing Tour-Pak™ Luggage Rack P/N 79179-08 or 53000063. Also fits '09-'13 FLHTCUSE models with Original Equipment Touring Rack.

name: Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail LED Light Kit

name: Tail Light Collar

details: Fits '73-later models (except VRSC™, XG, XR, XL883N, XL1200CX, XL1200N, XL1200NS, XL1200SX, XL1200V, XL1200X, FXDF, FXDLS, FXDWG, FXWG, FLS, FLSB, FLSS, FLSTN, FLSTS, FLSTSB, FX Softail™, FXSE, FLHX, FLHTCUTG, FLRT, FLTRX and FLTRXS, '11-later XL1200C, '09-'17 FXDB, '14-later FLHXS, FLHRSE and FLHTKSE and '09-later FLHR and FLTR models).

name: Tail Light Collar

details: Fits '06-'09 FLHX and '09-later FLHR, FLHRC and FLHT and '06-'09 FLTR and FLHTCUTG models with Original Equipment tail lamp. Also fits Touring models equipped with Bullet Turn Signal and License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 53702-04A.

name: Clear Lens with Vertical Reflector Optics Auxiliary Lamp Bulb Kit
description: Designed to complement the Smooth Headlamp with Reflector Optics found on '05-later Harley-Davidson™ motorcycles.
details: Fits all models with Original Equipment or accessory Auxiliary Lighting Kits (except '14-later Street Glide™, Electra Glide™, Ultra Limited™ and Trike models). Sold in pairs. Does not fit '18-Later Softail™

description: Upgrade the Original Equipment Tri-Bar fender light from a single-mode running light to a dual-mode running and brake light.

name: Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail LED Light Kit

name: Front Directional Relocation Kit

details: Fits '88-later XL (except XL1200CX, XL1200T, XL1200X, XL1200XS and '11-later XL883L and XL1200C) and '91-'05 Dyna™ models (except FXDWG and FXDXT).

name: License Plate/Turn Signal Relocation Kit
description: A necessary addition when attaching a saddlebag on Dyna™ models.

name: Bullet Headlamp Mounting System
description: Chrome-plated headlamp mounts are designed to position the Bullet Headlamp Kit in the proper location for specific vehicle applications.
details: Fits '94-'05 FXDWG, '08-'17 FXCW, FXCWC, FXS, FXSB and FXSBSE, '86-'10 FXSTC, '99-'15 FXST, FXSTB and FXSTC and '00-'07 FXSTD models.

name: Turn Signal Relocation Kit
description: This kit relocates the turn signals to the passing lamp bracket, and allows the use of a H-D™ Detachables™ windshield. Kit includes all necessary hardware required for installation.
details: Fits '88-later XL (except XL1200CX and XL1200T and '16-later XL1200X and XL1200XS), '91-'05 Dyna™ and '84-'15 FXS, FXST, FXSTB and FXSTC models equipped with Auxiliary Lighting Kits.

name: Auxiliary Lighting Kit
description: There's a lot of road on this planet, and these chrome lamps will light the way. Just add the desired lamp bulb kit to complete the installation.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD).

name: Narrow Chrome Directional Bar
description: Enhance the rear profile of your Softail™ or Touring model with this Narrow Chrome Directional Bar that enhances the visual proportions of the bike. At 10 inches wide, this die-cast, chrome-plated bar is 3 inches shorter than the stock bar and features the same great quality.
details: Fits '86-'17 FLST and FLSTC, '93-'96 FLSTN, '09-'13 FLHTC, FLHTCU and FLHTK and '91-'08 Touring models (except '04-later FLHRS and FLTR). (Does not fit with Flat Lens Turn Signal Module P/N 91699-99A.)

name: Bullet Rear Turn Signal Light Bar Kit

name: Sportster Fuel Gauge Kit
description: Finally, keep an eye on your Sportster™ model fuel level without watching how many miles you have traveled. In-tank sending unit employs capacitive sensing technology to accurately monitor the fuel level, and relays the information to a handlebar-mounted LED indicator for at-a-glance viewing.

name: Handlebar Clock
description: The freedom of the open road dictates the final destination, but sometimes you need to be there on time. The Clutch Lever Bracket Clamp Clock will keep you on schedule.

name: Handlebar Clock

details: Fits all models (except '15-later XG). Models equipped with reverse switch or Auxiliary Accessory Switch Housing Kits will require separate purchase of appropriate Handlebar Clock Mount Clamp.

name: Handlebar Thermometer
description: Designed to mount to the Brake Master Cylinder Clamp, this polished stainless steel temperature gauge will keep you in touch with the outside air temperature.

details: Fits all models (except '15-later XG). Models equipped with reverse switch or Auxiliary Accessory Switch Housing Kits will require separate purchase of appropriate Handlebar Clock Mount Clamp.

name: Fuel Gauge - Spun Aluminum Face
description: Add a touch of luxury and style to your dash. First featured on the '04 Screamin' Eagle™ Deuce™ and Electra Glide™ models, these Spun Aluminum Metal Face Gauges offer a rich contrast to a chrome console or black inner fairing surface.

name: Oil Pressure Gauge Kit

The custom mounting brackets have been polished and chrome-plated to rigid Harley-Davidson™ standards and the guage offers premium reliability.
details: Fits '99-'05 Dyna™, '00-'17 Softail™, '99-'13 FLHR and '99-'05 FLHT models. Does not fit with Billet Rocker™ Box Cover P/N 17658-03.

name: Boom! Audio Bass Booster Tour-Pak Port Kit
description: This Bass Booster Port Kit provides significant improvements in bass response without adding a subwoofer, and has no impact on usable Tour-Pak™ carrier cargo capacity. When installed, the open port permits the speaker pod to "breathe", reducing the compression effect that limits speaker cone travel.
details: Fits '06-'13 FLHTCU, FLHTK and FLTRU and '09-'13 FLHTCUTG models. Also fits '06-'11 FLHTCUSE models and other Touring models equipped with King Tour-Pak™ and Boom!™ Audio Rear Speaker Pod Kit. '06-'10 FLHTCUSE models require replacement of Original Equipment amplifier.  Does not fit with Boom!™ Audio High Output Sound System P/N 76418-06 or 76418-06A.  Dealer Digital Technician software update is required. Dealer installation is recommended.

name: Boom! Audio Rear Speaker Pod Kit
description: Add concert-hall sound to your motorcycle. Boom!™ Audio Rear Speaker Kit includes Boom!™ Audio high performance rear speakers, rear speaker pods, and passenger controls for rear headset volume, CB PTT, and radio tuning.

name: Boom! Audio Fairing Lower Speaker Kit
description: Drive through a wall of sound. Boom!™ Audio Fairing Lower Speakers provide two additional sound sources directed at the rider for a concert-hall sound experience.

name: Boom! Audio 4-Speaker Ultra Boom! Bagger Kit

This complete audio kit provides the latest in Harley-Davidson™ audio components, and includes Boom!™ Audio Fairing and Rear Speakers, the Boom!™ Audio Bass Booster Port Kit, and the Boom!™ Audio Tour-Pak™ Mounted Amplifier.

name: Boom! Audio Tour-Pak Amplifier

name: Boom! Audio Fairing Amplifier Kit

Not for use with Boom!™ Audio SiriusXM Satellite Radio Kit P/N 76404-06, Boom!™Audio Bike-to-Bike Communication Kit P/N 76416-06C or Tour-Pak™ luggage. Requires separate purchase of appropriate Wiring Harness. Models equipped with Boom!™ Audio iPod™ Interface P/N 76476-10 require separate purchase of iPod™ Relocation Kit P/N 76000238. Dealer Digital Technician software update is required. Dealer installation is recommended.

name: 2 Speaker Boom! Audio Street Glide Boom! Bagger Kit

Requires separate purchase of appropriate Wiring Harness. Models equipped with Boom!™ Audio iPod™ Interface P/N 76476-10 require separate purchase of iPod™ Relocation Kit P/N 76000238.

name: Road Tech zumo Handlebar Mount Kit

XL and XR models require separate purchase of (2) Screw P/N 4669M. Does not fit with Road Tech™ Satellite Radio, Left-Hand Auxiliary Switch Housing or Clutch Lever Bracket Clamp Clock or Thermometer. Must be wired on exterior of handlebar.

name: Road Tech zumo Handlebar Mount Kit
description: This installation kit is designed for handlebar mounting of the Road Tech™ zumo GPS system on specified Harley-Davidson™ models. Replacing the left-hand half clamp, this sweeping gloss black bracket accepts the connection cradle for the Road Tech™ zumo GPS system.
details: Fits ’02-'17 VRSC™ (except VRSCF and VRSCR), ’96-later XL and XR, '96-'17 Dyna™, '96-later Softail™ and '96-later Road King™, '97-'13 Road Glide™ and ’14-later Touring and Trike models equipped with Road Tech™ zumo 590, 660 or 665 GPS units. XL and XR models require separate purchase of (2) Screw P/N 4669M. Does not fit with Road Tech™ Satellite Radio, Left-Hand Auxiliary Switch Housing or Clutch Lever Bracket Clamp Clock or Thermometer. Must be wired on exterior of handlebar.

name: Boom! Audio Music Player Tank Pouch

name: Boom! Audio High Performance Boom! Bagger Electra Glide Fairing Speakers

name: Boom! Audio Stage I Speaker Expansion Kit
description: Add more Boom!™ to your bike. This kit permits the addition of a third pair of speakers to your Boom!™ Audio-equipped Touring bike. Choose a combination of Boom!™ Audio Fairing Lower Speakers and/or Rear Speaker Pods (sold separately) to build a sound system custom-designed to your audio demands. System also provides speaker fade capabilities between fairing and non-fairing mounted speakers for highway riding, when it's needed most.

Dealer installation is recommended. Not compatible with models equipped with Boom!™ Audio Stage II components.

name: Boom! Audio Bike-to-Bike Communications Kit
description: Communicate with your friends on any of 40 channels. Easy-to-use handlebar controls allow PTT and adjustable squelch levels for maximum performance and reception quality. Integrated CB System will mute the radio while in transmit or receive mode.
details: Fits '06-'13 Touring models equipped with an Advanced Audio Radio (except FLTRX, FLTRXSE and '11-'12 FLHXSE). Requires separate purchase of additional components (see your Dealer or instruction sheet for model-specific requirements).

name: Boom! Audio Bike-to-Bike Communications Kit
description: Communicate with your friends on any of 40 channels. Easy to use handlebar controls allow Push-To-Talk (PTT) and adjustable squelch levels for maximum performance and reception quality. Integrated CB System will mute the radio while in transmit or receive mode.

name: Tour-Pak Rear Speaker Enclosure Kit
description: Tour-Pak™ Rear Speaker Enclosures enable the installation of Boom!™ Audio 6.5" Rear Speakers on Street Glide™ and Road Glide™ models equipped with King Tour-Pak™ Luggage.

name: Boom! Box 6.5GT Radio Kit - Domestic
description: Take a big step up the technology ladder. The Boom!™ Box 6.5GT Infotainment System is the ideal upgrade for Touring models equipped with the standard Boom!™ Box 4.3 radio. One look at the brilliant 6.5 display, and you know that this is something special.

name: Burst Rear Speaker Trim
description: Sculpted machining sends reflections of light in all directions. The Burst Collection Speaker Trim features a rich black anodized finish that is machined to expose the highlights of raw aluminum. The contrasting cut-back spider makes a powerful visual statement.

name: Boom! Audio Stage II Amplifier Kit - Fairing Mounted
description: Crank up the volume and let your bike speak for itself. Boom! Audio Amplifiers with built-in fixed EQs are smart, powerful, and tough.
details: Fits '15-later FLTRU, FLTRX and FLTRXS models. Original Equipment on ’15-later CVO™ Road Glide™ models. Dealer Digital Technician software update is required. Dealer installation is recommended. Separate purchase of Power Extension Harness P/N 69200921 is required if installed with Hidden AM/FM/WB Antenna P/N 76000513, Electra Glo™ Headlamp Trim Rings or Fairing Edge Lights.

name: Handlebar Phone Carrier Mount
description: Designed to place a smartphone or music device close at hand.

name: Road Glide Compartment Liners
description: Protect your belongings and reduce noise and rattles on the road.

name: Universal Handlebar Mount Phone Carrier
description: Put your smartphone within easy reach. This standard cradle places your phone or music device close to the hand controls of the motorcycle for easy access.
details: Fits '02-'17 VRSC™ (excpet VRSCF and VRSCR), '04-later XL (except XL88N, XL1200NS, and XL1200N), '08-'13 XR, '06-'17 Dyna™ (except FXDB), '00-later Softail™, '09-later Touring (except FLHTKSE and '15-later FLTRU, FLTRX, FLTRXS and FLTRXSE) and '09-later Trike models. Requires separate purchase of Phone Carrier Mount P/N 76000537

name: Road Tech Zumo 590 Navigation System
description: The road ahead is easy to see on a 5" dual-orientation touchscreen display that is glove friendly and sunlight readable – you'll find it on the rough and rugged zumo 590LM premium GPS motorcycle navigator. Tough enough to withstand the brutal elements and the harsh weather conditions, zumo 590LM offers hands-free phone control and spoken directions heard in-helmet via Bluetooth™ technology. Zumo includes an MP3 player and works with iPod™ and Pandora for music control right on its display.

name: Water Resistant Handlebar Mount Phone Carrier
description: Designed for life on the road, this rigid rain and dust resistant case protects your phone from the elements during all kinds of riding conditions.
details: Fits '02-'17 VRSC™ (except VRSCF and VRSCR), '04-later XL (except XL883N, XL1200NS, and XL1200N), '08-'13 XR, '06-'17 Dyna™ (except FXDB), '00-later Softail™, '09-later Touring (except FLHTKSE and '15-later FLTRU, FLTRX, FLTRXS and FLTRXSE), and '09-later Trike models. Requires separate purchase of Phone Carrier Mount P/N 76000537.

name: AM/FM Antenna Relocation Kit
description: Relocates your AM/FM antenna to the rear fender to accommodate use with a detachable Two-up Tour-Pak™ Mounting Rack.

name: Boom! Audio Stage II Tour-Pak Speaker Installation Kit

Also fits FLHX, FLHXS, FLHXSE, FLTRX, and FLTRXS models equipped with a King Tour-Pak™, rigid Tour-Pak™ mounting rack and Boom!™ Audio Rear Speaker Enclosure Kit P/N 76000505. FLHXSE models require purchase of Audio Input Harness P/N 69201477. FLHTKSE and FLTRUSE models require purchase of Speaker Interconnect Harness P/N 69200714 and Rear Speaker Jumper Harness P/N 69200489. Not compatible with models equipped with Stage I Boom!™ Audio components. Does not fit models with H-D™ Detachables™ Tour-Pak™ Mounting Rack.

name: Boom! Audio Stage II Fairing Lower Speaker Installation Kit

name: Water Resistant Handlebar Mount Phone Carrier
description: Designed for life on the road, this rigid rain and dust resistant case protects your phone from the elements during all kinds of riding conditions.

Requires separate purchase of Phone Carrier Mount P/N 76000537.

name: Boom! Audio Trike Body Speaker Installation Kit
description: Add more Boom to your Tri Glide™ Trike model. Big and bold is the best way to describe the musical performance you will experience when listening to your favorite band through a Boom!™ Audio sound system.

name: Boom! Audio Stage II Tour-Pak Speaker Installation Kit
description: Big and bold is the best way to describe the musical performance you will experience when listening to your favorite band through a Boom!™ Audio Stage II sound system.

name: Burst Rear Speaker Trim
description: Sculpted machining sends reflections of light in all directions. The Burst Collection Speaker Trim features a rich black anodized finish that is machined to expose the highlights of raw aluminum. The contrasting cut-back spider makes a powerful visual statement.
details: Fits '14-later Electra Glide™, Street Glide™, Ultra Limited™, Road Glide™ and Tri Glide™ models with Original Equipment or Boom!™ Audio Stage I Tour-Pak™ mounted speakers.

name: Boom! Audio Bluetooth Cruiser Amp and Speaker Expansion Kit

description: The Boom!™ Audio 20S EVO headset is a state-of-the-art Bluetooth™ 4.1 communication system. Call hands-free with your Bluetooth™ mobile phones, listen to stereo music or voice instructions of GPS navigation by Bluetooth™ wirelessly, and have intercom conversations in full duplex with a passenger and/or other riders. The 20S EVO headset features Audio Multitasking technology that enables intercom conversation while simultaneously listening to the built-in FM radio or Bluetooth™-sourced music...

Box GTS radio when equipped with Wireless Headset Interface Module P/N 76000768. NOTE: Headset software update may be required for use with Wireless Headset Interface Module P/N 76000768. Visit H-D™.com for details.

System also provides speaker fade capabilities between fairing and non-fairing mounted speakers for highway riding, when it’s needed most.

Each speaker is rated to handle up to 75 watts of power, and with two amplifiers up to eight speakers can be installed in a single system. Designed to fit perfectly in the Original Equipment speaker housing, each kit includes Left and Right speakers and custom grilles...

name: Harley-Davidson Universal Phone Carrier and Clutch Mount
description: This phone mount system is certified by Harley-Davidson to withstand the same testing endured by all of our motorcycle accessories, including UV exposure, adhesion pull-off testing, vibration and latch cycle testing, and even aerodynamic loads. Harley has over-engineered this mount to ensuring your phone stays connected to the bike.
details: Fits ’20-Later ELW, '02-'17 VRSC™, ’15-Later XG, '04-later XL (except XL88N, XL1200NS, and XL1200N), '08-'13 XR, '06-'17 Dyna™ (except FXDB), '00-later Softail™, '09-later Touring (except '09-'13 FLHTCUSE and '14-'16 FLHTKSE), and '09-later Trike.

Not recommended for Batwing Touring models with stock handlebars.

Powerful, intelligent amplifier with digital signal processing (DSP) technology developed jointly by Harley-Davidson and Rockford Fosgate™ is engineered to perform in the demanding motorcycle environment. Connects to your mobile device via Bluetooth to play stored or streaming audio through Harley-Davidson Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ speakers (sold separately) and turns your...
details: Fits '14-later Road King™ (except FLHRC) and '19-later Electra Glide models. Requires separate purchase of Installation Kit P/N 76001113. Required for the installation of one Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ Stage 2 speaker kit. Does not fit with Saddlebag Guard Rails.

name: Harley-Davidson Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate - CVO Model Wire Harness
description: Use this Harness Kit to upgrade certain CVO model motorcycles to a Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ system.

description: Includes components required for installation of Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ Amplifier P/N 76001074 in a Road King™ model.
details: Fits '14-later Road King and '19-later Electra Glide models equipped with Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ Amplifier w/DSP P/N 76001074.

name: Harley-Davidson Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate Primary Subwoofer Kit
description: The deep bass will turn heads when you roll up playing your Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ Subwoofer Kit. Designed for 2014-later Touring bikes equipped with Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ audio, these plug-and-play 10-inch subwoofers enable heart-thumping bass while cruising around the city streets or out on the open road. Can be installed as a single subwoofer or a dual subwoofer set.
details: Fits ‘14-later Touring models in the right-side saddlebag when equipped with two or four total speakers on a Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ audio system. '21-'22 FLHXSE, FLTRXSE and '22 FLTRKSE requires separate purchase of Bluetooth Dongle P/N 41000771, Secondary Amp Kit P/N 76000990 and Secondary Amp Install Kit P/N 76000975. Does not fit Trike or Road King models.

name: Harley-Davidson Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate Secondary Subwoofer Kit
description: The deep bass will turn heads when you roll up playing your Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ Subwoofer Kit. Designed for 2014-later Touring bikes equipped with Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ audio, these plug-and-play 10-inch subwoofers enable heart-thumping bass while cruising around the city streets or out on the open road. Can be installed as a single subwoofer or a dual subwoofer set.
details: Fits ‘14-later Touring models in the left-side saddlebag when equipped with two or four total speakers on a Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ audio system. Does not fit Trike or Road King models. Installation of second subwoofer kit requires separate purchase of Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ amplifier P/N 76000990.

name: Harley-Davidson Audio 50S Bluetooth Headset - Single
description: The flagship Harley-Davidson™ Audio 50S Bluetooth Headset is engineered to simplify and extend wireless communication, now equipped with Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ Stage I Speakers for Wireless Headsets for outstanding audio. Box and Boom!™ Box GTS radio when equipped with Wireless Headset Interface Module P/N 76000768. Headset speakers intended for helmets with speaker cut-outs.

name: Harley-Davidson Audio 50C Bluetooth Headset - Single

name: Harley-Davidson Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate Inner Fairing Audio Kit
description: A high-performance motorcycle deserves high-output audio. This kit was designed alongside the Low Rider™ ST for outstanding performance and an ideal fit within the fairing. A powerful, intelligent amplifier with digital signal processing (DSP) technology developed jointly by Harley-Davidson and Rockford Fosgate™ is engineered to perform in the demanding motorcycle environment. Connects to your mobile device via Bluetooth to play stored or streaming audio through a pair of built-in two-way...
details: Fits '22-later FXLRST models.

name: AM/FM Antenna Relocation Kit
description: This Antenna Relocation Kit allows you to easily switch between your H-D™ Detachables™ Tour-Pak™ luggage, a detachable passenger backrest, or the clean look of a stock FLHT or FLTR.
details: Fits '97-'08 FLTR and FLHX equipped with Detachable Two-Up Luggage Rack P/N 53743-97 and Two-Up Detachable Docking Hardware Kit P/N 53804-06.

name: Hand-Held CB Microphone Kit
description: This device allows communication with other bikes or vehicles with CB equipment
details: Fits '98-'13 FLHTC, FLHTCU and FLTRU and '09-'13 FLHTCUTG models. Also fits models equipped with Communication Kits 77107-09, 77108-09A and 77173-08.

name: Boom! Audio Shorty CB Antenna
description: This compact antenna is only 19" tall, and is a stylish change from the Original Equipment whip antenna.
details: Fits '98-'08 Touring models equipped with Bike-to-Bike Communication. May require model-specific mounting bracket if installed on a model without a Tour-Pak™ carrier.

name: Boom! Audio Shorty CB Antenna
description: This compact antenna is only 19" tall, and is a stylish change from the Original Equipment whip antenna.
details: Fits '09-later Touring models equipped with Bike-to-Bike Communication.  May require model-speciific mounting bracket if installed on a model without a Tour-Pak™ carrier.

name: Boom! Audio iPod Interface
description: The Boom!™ Audio iPod™ interface allows you to access your iPod™ playlists, artists, songs, and albums while you keep your hands on the handlebar. Just plug in your iPod™ Nano, iPod™ Touch or iPhone™ and hit the road.

Does not fit '11 CVO™ FLHTCUSE. '06-later FLHTC, FLHX, FLTR and FLTRX models and those not equipped with Wiring Harness P/N 70169-06 require the separate purchase of Connector Kit P/N 69200033. Models equipped with Boom!™ Audio Fairing Amplifier require installation of iPod™ Relocation Kit P/N 76000238.

name: AM/FM Antenna Relocation Kit
description: This Antenna Relocation Kit allows you to easily switch between your H-D™ Detachables™ Tour-Pak™ luggage, a passenger backrest, or the clean look of a stock FLHT or FLTR.
details: Fits '09-'13 FLHX, FLTR, FLTRU and FLTRX models (except FLTRUSE, FLTRXSE, '10-'12 FLHXSE and '09 FLTRSE models) equipped with Detachable Two-Up Luggage Rack P/N 54215-09. Does not fit with Nostalgic Saddlebag Guard Rail Kit P/N 91286-10.

name: Boom! Audio Half Helmet Music and Communications Headset

name: Boom! Audio High Performance Boom! Bagger Road Glide Fairing Speakers

name: Boom! Audio Full Helmet Premium Music and Communications Headset
description: This comfortable headset is designed to allow full communication function while wearing a 3/4 or full-face helmet. The stylish plug module clamps to the base of the helmet and positions the adjustable windsock-equipped boom microphone for the best sound quality.
details: Fits ’98-later FLHT, FLHTCU, FLHTCUSE, FLHTK, FLHTKSE, FLTRU, FLTRUSE and FLHTCUTG models with a Boom!™ Box audio system (except models set up for wireless headsets) . Also fits with vehicles equipped with Communication Switch Kit P/N 77173-08 or Boom!™ Audio Music and Intercom Kits.

name: Bar & Shield Radio Faceplate
description: This brushed aluminum radio faceplate features the Harley-Davidson™ Bar & Shield graphic in the upper corner. Simple self-adhesive installation on any model equipped with the Advanced Audio System Radio.

name: Boom! Audio High Performance Boom! Bagger Electra Glide Fairing Speakers
description: Capture every note. Boom!™ Bagger High Performance Speakers are designed for maximum performance in the harsh motorcycle environment.

name: Air Wing Tour-Pak Chrome Luggage Rack
description: The low-profile aerodynamic styling of the Air Wing Tour-Pak™ Luggage Rack enhances the look of any Razor-Pak, Chopped or King Tour-Pak™ lid. The mirror-like chrome-plating draws your eye to the sleek lines, and the engraved Harley-Davidson™ script adds a signature finish.
details: Fits King, Chopped and Razor-Pak Tour-Pak™ carrier's lids. Mounting hole pattern matches Premium Tour-Pak™ Luggage Rack P/N 53665-87.

name: Smooth Razor-Pak Backrest Pad
description: Clean, smooth styling complements most seating surfaces.
details: Fits '97-'13 models equipped with Razor-Pak luggage.

name: Chrome Premium Tour-Pak Hinges
description: Upgrade the appearance of your Tour-Pak™ with billet-style premium hinges.
details: Fits '88-'13 Touring and Trike models equipped with Razor-Pak, Chopped or King Tour-Pak™ Luggage.

name: Dome Hex Nuts
description: Update the custom look with Chrome Dome hardware. These uniquely styled hex nuts bring a new look to the traditional acorn shape, and feature a low profile design and a smooth chrome finish.
