name: Jet Black Exhaust Shield Kit
description: Extend the blacked-out look along the bike's entire profile. These formed steel exhaust shields feature a unique jet black ceramic coating that complements the jet black Screamin' Eagle™ Street Performance Slip-On Mufflers.

name: Jet Black Exhaust Shield Kit
description: Extend the blacked-out look along the bike's entire profile. These formed steel exhaust shields feature a unique jet black ceramic coating that complements the jet black Screamin' Eagle™ Street Performance Slip-On Mufflers.

name: Trike Fender Trim
description: This Chrome Fender Trim Kit dresses the opening of the wheel well and adds a touch of elegance to the rear of the bike.
details: Fits '09-later FLHTCUTG and '10-'11 FLHXXX models.

name: Chrome Lower Fork Sliders
description: Competitively priced, these chrome-plated Lower Fork Sliders give your bike upfront style. To ensure proper fitment and function, these sliders are manufactured from Original Equipment components.

name: Trunk Guard
description: Unique rear guard wraps around the bodywork to protect your finish from damage. Lightweight steel tubing incorporates high-quality welded joints and is hand-polished and chrome-plated for a brilliant finish.
details: Fits '09-later Trike models (except FLRT).

name: Wheel Center Cover Kit
description: These chrome-plated hubcaps adds style and depth to the Trike rear wheels.

name: Exhaust Trim for Trike Models
description: This chrome-plated accent piece trims the exhaust openings in the trunk fascia, and adds a touch of brightwork to the rear of the bike.
details: Fits '09-later FLHTCUTG and '10-'11 FLHXXX models.

name: Original Equipment Rear Brake Pads
description: Original Equipment replacement brake pads.
details: Fits '09-'13 Trike models.

name: Trike Trunk Interior Light Kit
description: Don't be left in the dark. This bright convenience lamp kit turns nighttime into day when you open your Trike's trunk.
details: Fits '09-later FLHTCUTG models.

name: Body Scuff Guards
description: Guard against heel marks and stone chips on the leading edges of the body of your Trike model.
details: Fits '09-later FLHTCUTG and '10-'11 FLHXXX models.

name: Fender Scuff Guards
description: Guard against heel marks and stone chips on the leading edges of the rear fender of your Trike model.
details: Fits '09-later FLHTCUTG and '10-'11 FLHXXX models.

name: Transparent Paint Guard Kit
description: This transparent skin is designed to protect parts of the Trike bodywork from boot scuffs and road debris.
details: Fits '09-later FLHTCUTG and '10-'11 FLHXXX models. Not recommended for use on denim or aftermarket paint

name: Trike Saddlebags
description: Add additional storage at your fingertips. These vinyl-wrapped rigid side bags are a perfect match to either the Original Equipment or accessory seats, and are contoured to fit comfortably under the passenger's legs.

name: Saddlebag Wall Organizer
description: Convenient storage net wraps the interior walls of your Color-Matched Saddlebags for easy access to keys, cell phones, maps, and gloves.
details: Fits '93-'13 Touring models equipped with Hard Saddlebags.

name: Saddlebag Strap Repair Kit
description: This repair kit features all the materials you need to help repair your saddlebag strap.

name: Fat Boy Leather Saddlebags
description: Carry your essentials in style with these premium heavy leather saddlebags.
details: Fits '00-'17 Softail™ models (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTC, FLSTNSE, FXCW, FXCWC, FXS, FXSB, FXSBSE, FXSE and FXSTD). Also fits '09 FXSTSSE models. FXSTC models require separate purchase of Hardware Kit P/N 90573-07. Also fits '84-'99 FLSTF, FXST, FXSTC and FXSTS models without H-D™ Detachables™ accessories when installed with Directional Relocation Kit P/N 53692-96. Does not fit with Rear Axle Covers, Wide Tire Kit P/N 43684-99A or Flat Lens Turn Signal Kit P/N 68431-95. FLSTFBS models require the removal of Original Equipment Rear Axle Covers.

name: Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail Kit- Chrome
description: The low-profile aerodynamic styling of the Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail enhances the look and protects the lid of your Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags. Mirror-chrome finished rails cascade down the front of the saddlebag to protect the paint from a misplaced boot heel.
details: Fits '93-'13 Touring models with Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags. Does not fit models with leather covered bags, models equipped with Saddlebag Wing Tips P/N 53826-00B or models equipped with Saddlebag Speaker Kit P/N 76000202.

name: H-D Detachables Leather Saddlebags
description: Styled to complement the '07-'11 Fat Boy™ model. These large capacity detachable Saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle, leaving your bike clean and ready to cruise the boulevard.
details: Fits '07-'17 FLSTF, FLSTFB and FLSTFBS models. Models equipped with detachable accessories require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 88256-07. Models without detachable accessories require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 53932-03A. Models equipped with Rigid Accessories require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 88298-07. All models require separate purchase of Rear Directional Relocation Kit P/N 69929-07 or 73369-10. Does not fit with Passenger Footboards or Rear Axle Covers. FLSTFBS models require the removal of Original Equipment Rear Axle Covers.

name: Heritage Flat Top & Lock Kit
description: Unique saddlebag structure incorporates a barrel-style lock to secure your Heritage Softail™ Saddlebags, and offers an unobtrusive internal reinforcement bracket that adds rigidity and preserves the original shape after extended periods of exposure to the weather.
details: Fits '00-'15 FLSTC Original Equipment saddlebags and Heritage Style Saddlebag Kit P/N 90876-05. Requires separate purchase of Keyed-to-Match Barrel Lock Kit P/N 90300010. See instruction sheet for additional installation supplies required.

name: Smooth Leather Saddlebags
description: Shaped to accent the arching rear fender, the rounded profile and rear swept straps set the style for this traditional saddlebag.

name: H-D Detachables Leather Saddlebags
description: These large capacity H-D™ Detachables™ Leather Saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle, leaving your bike clean and ready to cruise the boulevard.
details: Fits '02-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD, '02-'05 FXDWG, and '09-'17 FXDB with optional strut covers). '02-'05 models require separate purchase of Mounting Hardware Kit P/N 92025-09. '10-'17 FXDWG models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68544-10. '09-'17 FXDB models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68227-09. '13-'17 FXDB models equipped with side-mount license plate requires License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 67900130. '16-'17 FXDLS models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68227-09 and Side Mount License Plate Kit P/N 60938-10 or 60978-10. All other years and models (except FXDF and FXDWG) require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68732-02A (Domestic), 68733-02A (International) or Layback License Plate Kit P/N 60215-06. Not for use with Rear Axle Covers on FXDF and FXDWG models.

name: Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of H-D Detachables Saddlebags P/N 90200353B and 90200678.
details: Fits '11-'17 FLS and FLSS and '11-'13 FXS  models equipped with H-D™ Detachables™ Saddlebags and detachable accessories.

name: Softail Blackline Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of Detachable Saddlebags P/N 90200353 on FXS Blackline™ models.

name: Single-Sided Swingarm Bag
description: Less is more. With enough room for the essentials, these stylish Single-Sided Swingarm Bags eliminate the need to stuff your pockets or bungee a bag across the passenger pillion.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD) equipped with Solo Seats. Requires removal of passenger pegs. Luggage capacity: 265 cubic inches total.

name: Saddlebag Speaker Lid
description: Custom saddlebag lids are shaped to accommodate Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag Lid Speakers. Speaker cutouts are formed to angle the speakers and direct the sound forward toward the rider and passenger.
details: Fits '06-'13 Touring models equipped with Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag Speaker Kit P/N 76000202.

name: Saddlebag Speaker Lid
description: Custom saddlebag lids are shaped to accommodate Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag Lid Speakers. Speaker cutouts are formed to angle the speakers and direct the sound forward toward the rider and passenger.

name: H-D Detachables Leather Saddlebags - Smooth
description: These large capacity H-D™ Detachables™ Leather Saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle, leaving your bike clean and ready to cruise the boulevard.
details: Fits '07-'17 FLSTF, FLSTFB and FLSTFBS models. Models equipped with detachable accessories require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 88256-07. Models without detachable accessories require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 53932-03A. Models equipped with Rigid Accessories require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 88298-07. All models require separate purchase of Rear Directional Relocation Kit P/N 69929-07 or 73369-10. Does not fit with Passenger Footboards or Rear Axle Covers. FLSTFBS models require the removal of Original Equipment Rear Axle Covers.

name: Heritage Classic Quick-Detach Saddlebag Conversion Kit
description: Kit converts Original Equipment fixed-mount Heritage Softail™ Classic saddlebags to bags that can be removed in seconds.
details: Fits '03-'17 FLSTC models equipped with Original Equipment Heritage Softail™ Classic saddlebags. Installation requires separate purchase of appropriate Docking Hardware Kit. Models equipped with detachable saddlebags alone require Docking Kit P/N 90200669. Models equipped with detachable accessories and saddlebags require Docking Kit P/N 90200670. Does not fit with Passenger Footboards, Rear Saddlebag Guards or Rear Axle Covers.

name: Saddlebags Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of Detachable Saddlebag Kit P/N 90200641 on FLSTC models.
details: Fits '03-'17 FLSTC models equipped with Quick-Detach Saddlebag Kit P/N 90200641A only.

name: Detachable Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of Detachable Saddlebag Kit P/N 90200641 on FLSTC models.

name: H-D Detachables Leather Saddlebags - Softail Slim and Blackline Models
description: Styled to complement the unique look of the stripped down Softail™ Slim and Blackline™ models, these midsize Detachable Saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle, leaving your bike clean and ready to cruise the boulevard.
details: Fits '11-'17 FLS and FLSS and '11-'13 FXS models. Models with Original Equipment side-mount license plate require separate purchase of License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 67900127A. Installation requires separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800065 and appropriate Docking Hardware Kit. Models equipped with detachable saddlebags only requires Docking Kit P/N 90200390, and models equipped with detachable accessories and saddlebags require Docking Kit P/N 90200389. Models equipped with a center-mount license plate and fender-mounted reflectors require installation of Reflector, Red P/N 67900223 or Reflector, Amber P/N 67900224. FLSS models require the removal of Original Equipment Rear Axle Covers.

name: Saddlebag Spoilers LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit for Saddlebag Lid Spoilers, this fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light, brake light and turn signals.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models equipped with Saddlebag Spoiler Kit (sold in pairs).

name: Saddlebag Spoilers LED Light Kit
description: Custom fit for Saddlebag Lid Spoilers, this fast-acting LED Light Kit operates as a supplemental rear running light, brake light and turn signals.

name: Touring Saddlebag Lid Rails
description: Elegant welded rails formed of high-quality tubing, beautifully polished and chrome plated to a mirror-like finish.

name: Chrome Rear Saddlebag Guards
description: Complete kit replaces the under-saddlebag support found on some Touring models with loop-style saddlebag guards for a traditional look. Featured as Original Equipment on any Touring models, these chrome-plated guards protect the leading edge of the saddlebag, and are shaped to accept Saddlebag Guard Bags (sold separately) for added storage.

name: Gloss Black Rear Saddlebag Guards
description: Complete kit replaces the under-saddlebag support found on some Touring models with loop-style saddlebag guards for a traditional look. Featured as Original Equipment on any Touring models, these chrome-plated guards protect the leading edge of the saddlebag, and are shaped to accept Saddlebag Guard Bags (sold separately) for added storage.
details: Fits ’14-later FLHRSE, FLHRXS, FLHT, FLHX, FLHXS, FLHXSE, FLTRU, FLTRUSE, FLTRX,FLTRXS and FLTRXSE models. Stock on ’14-later FLHR, FLHRC, FLHTCU, FLHTCUL, FLHTK, FLHTKL, FLHTKSE and FLTRK models

name: Gloss Black Rear Saddlebag Guards
description: Designed to replace the Original Equipment chrome-plated guards featured on many Touring models, the blacked-out finish minimizes the look without a reduction in protection.

name: Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail Kit
description: The low-profile aerodynamic styling of the Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail enhances the look and protects the lid of your Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags. Mirror-chrome finished rails cascade down the front of the saddlebag to protect the paint from a misplaced boot heel.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models with Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags. Does not fit FLHXSE or models with saddlebag lid speakers or Passenger Armrest Kit P/N 52400073.

name: Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail Kit
description: The low-profile aerodynamic styling of the Air Wing Saddlebag Lid Rail enhances the look and protects the lid of your Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags. Gloss black finished rails cascade down the front of the saddlebag to protect the paint from a misplaced boot heel.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models with Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags. Does not fit FLHXSE or models with saddlebag lid speakers or Passenger Armrest Kit P/N 52400073.

name: H-D Detachables Leather Saddlebags
description: Sized for a ride to the corner store or to Sturgis, these handsome detachable saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle, leaving your bike clean and ready to cruise the boulevard.
details: Fits '13-'17 FXSB and FXSBSE models and '16-'17 FXSE models. Installation requires separate purchase of appropriate Docking Hardware Kit P/N 52300239. Models equipped with detachable accessories and saddlebags require Docking Kit P/N 52300243.

name: Color-Matched Saddlebag Speaker Lid - Right
description: Custom Color-Matched covers are shaped to accommodate Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ or Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag Speakers. Speaker openings are formed to angle the speakers and direct the sound forward toward the rider and passenger. Installation reuses Original Equipment hinges, locks and mounting hardware.
details: Fits '14-later Touring (except Road King) models equipped Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ or  Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag Speakers.

name: Color-Matched Saddlebag Speaker Lid - Left
description: Custom Color-Matched covers are shaped to accommodate Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ or Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag Speakers. Speaker openings are formed to angle the speakers and direct the sound forward toward the rider and passenger. Installation reuses Original Equipment hinges, locks and mounting hardware.
details: Fits '14-later Touring (except Road King) models equipped Harley-Davidson™ Audio powered by Rockford Fosgate™ or  Boom!™ Audio Saddlebag Speakers.

name: Chrome Saddlebag Filler Strip Kit
description: For those who seek perfection, these kits fill in the gaps between the fender and the rear of the saddlebags, hiding the saddlebag mounting bracket.

name: Chrome Slotted Saddlebag Filler Strip Kit
description: For those who seek perfection, this kit fills in the gaps between the fender and the rear of the saddlebags, hiding the saddlebag mounting bracket.

name: Touring Saddlebag Lid Rails
description: Elegant welded rails formed of high-quality tubing, beautifully polished and chrome plated to a mirror-like finish.

name: Saddlebag Wall Organizer
description: Convenient storage system equips the interior wall of your Color-Matched Saddlebags for easy access to keys, cell phones, maps, and gloves. The organizer features a combination of mesh and enclosed pouches and pockets that are sized for safe, rattle-free packing.

name: Throw-Over Saddlebags
description: Ballastic Nylon throw over saddlebags offer convenient storage and can be easily removed for transport.
details: Fits '15-later XG models (except XG750A).

name: Gloss Black Saddlebag Latch and Hinge Kit
description: Gloss Black Saddlebag Hinge Covers and finger-operated Latches are an easy way to give your Touring bike a unique monochrome look.

name: Billet Saddlebag Hinge Cover Kit - Edge Cut
description: Dress your saddlebags in style. Edge Cut Saddlebag hinge Covers feature a rich black finish that is machined to expose the highlights of raw aluminum.

name: Premium Fitted Saddlebag Lining
description: Protect your belongings and reduce noise and rattles on the road. Soft-touch felt-finish liner is formed to the hard saddlebag interior for a perfect fit.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models equipped with Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags (except FLHXSE, FLTRXSE models).

name: Saddlebag Support Kit
description: Complete the stripped-down look by eliminating the rear saddlebag guards. This kit replaces the Original Equipment loop saddlebag guard and support with an inconspicuous bolt-on bar that supports the saddlebag for a clean, custom appearance.

name: Saddlebag Cooler
description: Keep beverages and snacks cold right in your saddlebag on those hot summer rides. This zippered bag is fully lined and insulated, and fits the full length of your saddlebag.
details: Fits '93-later Touring models equipped with Color-Matched Hard Saddlebags.

name: Saddlebag Lid Bra
description: Protect your saddlebags from boot scuffs, stone chips and road debris.

name: Dyna Switchback Rear Saddlebag Guards
description: Add protection and style to your ride. These chrome guards add a traditional Bagger look to the Dyna™ Switchback model, and protect the leading edge of the saddlebags.

name: Gloss Black Saddlebag Latch Kit
description: Gloss Black Saddlebag Hinge Covers and finger-operated Latches are an easy way to give your Touring bike a unique monochrome look.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models (except FLHXSE and FLTRXSE) equipped with hard saddlebags.

name: Billet Saddlebag Hinge Cover Kit - Chrome Grooved
description: This sweep of chrome will set the tone for a very special Touring custom. Manufactured from 6061-T6 billet aluminum, this polished and cover replaces the Original Equipment saddlebag hinge for a striking look.

name: Fender Support Kit - Gloss Black
description: Manufactured from Original Equipment components to ensure superior fit and finish, the gloss black Fender Support Kit replaces the Original Equipment cast and chrome fender support system and continues the dark look to the area between and behind the saddlebags.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models.

name: Chrome Saddlebag Guards
description: Saddlebag guards provide a style borrowed from the past that makes a unique statement here and now.

name: Black Saddlebag Guards
description: Saddlebag guards provide a style borrowed from the past that makes a unique statement here and now.
details: Fits '18-later FLHC and FLHCS models.

name: Rigid Leather Locking Saddlebags
description: These premium textured leather Sportster saddlebags are ready to go the distance. The push-button latching swing-out lid is easy to operate with one hand, and the fine leather surface and brushed chrome medallion add an elegant touch.
details: Fits ’04-later XL models (except XL1200CX, XL1200T, XL1200V and International (non-Canadian) XL883N, XL1200N or XL1200X models and models with Rear Axle Covers.  Models with side-mount license plates require License Plate/Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 73279-10.  ’11-later XL1200C models require Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800071 (Domestic) or 67800077 (International).  All other models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68732-02A (Domestic), 68733-02A (International) or Layback License Plate Kit P/N 60215-06.  Models equipped with H-DR Detachables™ accessories require separate purchase of Docking Hardware Kit P/N 53544-04 (if not already equipped).

name: Chrome Saddlebag Supports
description: Keep your throw-over style saddlebags away from the wheel, swingarm and brake caliper.

name: Single-Sided Swingarm Bag
description: Less is more. With enough room for the essentials, this stylish Swingarm Bag eliminates the need to stuff your pockets or bungee a bag across the passenger pillion.

name: Sportster Leather Saddlebags
description: These Sportster saddlebags are constructed from 9 oz. leather with thermoformed backs for added shape retention.

name: H-D Detachables Leather Saddlebags
description: Sized for a ride to the corner store or to Sturgis, these handsome detachable saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle, leaving your bike clean and ready to cruise the boulevard.

name: Docking Hardware Kit
description: Required for installation of H-D Detachable Saddlebag P/N 90201328.

name: Saddlebag Supports
description: Keep your throw-over style saddlebags away from the wheel, swingarm and brake caliper.
details: Fits ’00-later XL models (except XL1200CX, XL1200S, XL1200T and ’02-’03 XL883R). Does not fit with H-D™ Detachables™ accessories.

name: H-D Detachables Locking Saddlebags
description: Shaped to complement the flowing lines of the Softail™ cruiser models, these premium saddlebags feature a classic slant-style design with a modern twist.
details: Fits '18-later FLFB, FLFBS, FXBR, and FXBRS models.  Requires License Plate/Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800802 or 67800830. Luggage capacity: 2,840 cubic inches total.

name: H-D Detachables Leather Saddlebags – Nostalgic Style
description: These traditional throw-over style leather saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle, leaving your bike clean and ready to cruise the boulevard. When removed, the bag leaves behind simple, inconspicuous docking points.
details: Fits '18-later FLSL, FXBB, FXLR and FXLRS models. Installation requires separate purchase of License Plate/Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800802 or 67800830.

name: H-D Detachables Locking Saddlebags
description: Shaped to complement the flowing lines of the Softail™ cruiser models, these premium saddlebags feature a classic slant-style design with a modern twist.
details: Fits '18-later FLDE models. Luggage capacity: 2,970 cubic inches total.

name: Rigid Mount Saddlebags
description: These premium saddlebags are ready to go the distance. Styled to complement the Softail Deluxe model’s profile, these bags offer plenty of storage for a trip across town or across the country.
details: Fits '18-later FLDE models.

name: H-D Detachables Saddlebags
description: Sized for commute to work or a ride across the country, these modern bags are styled to complement the stripped down look of the Softail™ cruiser models. These modern waterfall-style saddlebags are completely removable with the simple pull of the internal handle and a rearward slide, leaving your bike stripped down and unencumbered.
details: Fits '18-later FLSL, FXBB, FXLR and FXLRS models. Installation requires separate purchase of License Plate/Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800802 or 67800830.

name: Single-Sided Swingarm Bag
description: Less is more. With enough room for the essentials, this stylish Swingarm Bag eliminates the need to stuff your pockets or bungee a bag across the passenger pillion.
details: Fits ’00-later Softail™ models (except FLSTC, FLSTNSE, FLSTSE, FXCW, and FXCWC). Does not fit models equipped with rear axle covers, left hand tool box, passenger footboards, chrome swingarm covers, saddlebags, or saddlebag guards.

name: Single-Sided Swingarm Bag
description: Less is more. With enough room for the essentials, this stylish Swingarm Bag eliminates the need to stuff your pockets or bungee a bag across the passenger pillion.
details: Fits ’00-later Softail™ models (except FLSTC, FLSTNSE, FLSTSE, FXCW, and FXCWC). Does not fit models equipped with rear axle covers, left hand tool box, passenger footboards, chrome swingarm covers, saddlebags, or saddlebag guards.

name: H-D Detachables Saddlebags – Brass Trim
description: Trimmed with classic valise straps, brass buckles and a matching brass Harley-Davidson™ signature medallion, these bags are the perfect complement to your custom ride.
details: Fits '18-later FLDE models. Luggage capacity: 2,970 cubic inches total.

name: H-D Detachables Saddlebags – Brass Trim
description: Trimmed with classic valise straps, brass buckles and a matching brass Harley-Davidson™ signature medallion, these bags are the perfect complement to your custom ride.
details: Fits '18-later FLFB, FLFBS, FXBR, and FXBRS models.  Requires License Plate/Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800802 or 67800830. Luggage capacity: 2,840 cubic inches total.

name: Black Standard Line Swingarm Bag
description: The Black Standard Collection Bags have a simple, black on black style that complements many styling directions and budgets.

name: Black Standard Line Compact Throw-Over Saddlebags
description: The Black Standard Collection Bags have a simple, black on black style that complements many styling directions and budgets.

name: Black Standard Line Large Throw-Over Saddlebags
description: The Black Standard Collection Bags have a simple, black on black style that complements many styling directions and budgets.
details: Fits '82-later XL (except 1200T), '08-'17 Dyna (except FLD), '84-'99 Softail, and '18-later Softail models equipped with H-D Saddlebag Supports.  '18-later Softail models require purchase of Turn Signal Relocation kit P/N 67800802 or 67800830.

name: Gloss Black Saddelbag Supports
description: Keep your throw-over style saddlebags away from the wheel, swingarm and brake caliper.
details: Fits '18-later FLSL, FXBB and FXST models. Required with Throw-Over Saddlebags P/Ns 90201770 or 90201769.

name: Saddlebag Guard Rails
description: Bolt on style and protection. These Saddlebag Guard Rails surround and protect the lower portion of the bag and add a traditional look to your Touring bike. The thick-walled chrome-plated tubing and the elegant cast mounts clamp securely to the Original Equipment saddlebag guards for a seamless look.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models (except FLHRC, FLHRSE, FLHXSE, and FLTRXSE).  FLHT, FLHRXS, FLTRX, FLTRXS, FLHXS, and FLHX require separate purchase of Saddlebag Guard and Support kit 90200787 or 90200788.  Does not fit with stretched side covers or CVO style rear fender system.

name: Saddlebag Guard Rails
description: Bolt on style and protection. These Saddlebag Guard Rails surround and protect the lower portion of the bag and add a traditional look to your Touring bike. The thick-walled chrome-plated tubing and the elegant cast mounts clamp securely to the Original Equipment saddlebag guards for a seamless look.
details: Fits '14-later Touring models (except FLHRC, FLHRSE, FLHXSE, and FLTRXSE).  FLHT, FLHRXS, FLTRX, FLTRXS, FLHXS, and FLHX require separate purchase of Saddlebag Guard and Support kit 90200787 or 90200788.  Does not fit with stretched side covers or CVO style rear fender system.

name: Sport Side Cases
description: Designed primarily for on-road touring, Sport Side Cases offer a smooth aesthetic and presents a clean silhouette on the motorcycle. Mounts are designed for easy installation and removal of the luggage and leave a clean look when the luggage is removed. With a gasket in the lid, the Sport Side Cases are waterproof and passes a rigorous Harley-Davidson™ water intrusion test.
details: Fits '21-later RA1250 and RA1250S models.

name: Aluminum Side Cases
description: This rugged aluminum luggage was created in collaboration with SW-MOTECH for on- and off-road travel. Each piece has been designed and tested with the motorcycle to ensure factory-quality fit, durability and reliability, without compromising motorcycle handling or lean angle. Both the cases and the mounts have passed Harley-Davidson static tip-over tests. The clear anodized finish is easy to clean and prevents oxidation. With a gasket in the lid, each piece is waterproof and passes a...
details: Fits '21-Later RA1250 and RA1250S models. Requires separate purschase of Side Case Mounting System P/N 90202087.

name: Side Case Mounting System
description: Factory integrated design mates perfectly to mounted points on the motorcycle. Installing and adjusting the system is simple and does not require specialty tools. Built to demanding Harley-Davidson™ specifications to ensure gear is protected in the most-rugged conditions.
details: Fits '21-Later RA1250 and RA1250S models.

name: Aluminum Side Cases
description: This rugged aluminum luggage was created in collaboration with SW-MOTECH for on- and off-road travel. Each piece has been designed and tested with the motorcycle to ensure factory-quality fit, durability and reliability, without compromising motorcycle handling or lean angle. Both the cases and the mounts have passed Harley-Davidson static tip-over tests. The black painted finish is easy to clean and prevents oxidation. With a gasket in the lid, each piece is waterproof and passes a...
details: Fits '21-Later RA1250 and RA1250S models. Requires separate purschase of Side Case Mounting System P/N 90202087.

name: Adventure Soft Saddlebags
description: The Adventure Soft Luggage line is intended for the hardcore off-road rider. Designed specifically for motorcycle use, these durable bags resist damage if the bike tips over. The bag material is waterproof, exterior pockets have waterproof zippers, and the roll-top closure creates a weather-tight seal, so you can ride with confidence knowing that gear will stay dry no matter the conditions. The roll-top design and multiple compression straps make it possible to cinch the load tightly and...
details: Fits '21-Later RA1250 and RA1250S models. Requires separate purchase of Side Case Mounting System P/N 90202087.

name: Sport Side Case Liners
description: Simplify packing and unpacking your motorcycle. These liners are designed to fit perfectly into Sport Side Cases. Styled with a Bar & Shield logo, these bags feature heavy-duty zippers, comfortable carrying handles and convenient D-rings for optional shoulder straps.
details: Fits '21-Later RA1250 and RA1250S models.

name: Vivid Black Sport Glide Saddlebag Outers
description: The perfect style upgrade to get your Sport Glide saddlebags to really standout in a crowd. Replace an unpainted Sport Glide saddlebag outer with these left and right parts color-matched in factory Vivid Black paint.
details: Fits '18-later FLSB models.

name: Saddlebag Bracket Relocation Kit
description: Required for installation of FLSTS Rear Saddlebag Guards P/N 49258-00A and FLSTC Rear Saddlebag Guard P/N 49261-00.
details: Fits '00-'17 FLSTC, FLSTS and FLSTSB models.

name: Lockset for Heritage Flat Top & Lock Kit
description: Necessary addition for installing locks on a Heritage flat top kit for saddlebags.
details: For use with Heritage Flat Top & Lock Kit P/N 88373-10A.

name: Universal Saddlebag Lock Kit
description: Keep the contents of your existing soft-sided saddlebags safe from the grab-and-go thief.
details: Fits most soft-sided leather and vinyl saddlebags. Does not fit FLHRC and FLHRS.

name: Locking H-D Detachables Latch Kit
description: This unique lock replaces the cam-lock on your H-D™ Detachables™ accessories, providing additional security and peace of mind when parking your vehicle.

name: Locking H-D Detachables Latch Kit
description: This unique lock replaces the cam-lock on your H-D™ Detachables™ accessories, providing additional security and peace of mind when parking your vehicle.
details: Fits all models equipped with detachable Sideplates, Racks, and Tour-Pak™ Luggage Carriers (except '18-later Softail™ models with HoldFast racks and uprights or '09-later Touring models equipped with detachable Solo Tour-Pak™ Rack).

name: H-D Smart Security System Hands-Free Fob
description: No more worrying about your pride and joy. The Hands-Free Fob communicates directly on its own unique and individualized frequency with the Hands-Free Security Module and Antenna.

name: H-D Smart Security System Hands-Free FOB
description: No more worrying about your pride and joy. The Hands-Free Fob communicates directly on its own unique and individualized frequency with the Hands-Free Security Module and Antenna.

name: Integrated Security & Locking Flip Fob
description: This hands-free fob automatically arms and disarms its electronic security functions as you approach and walk away from the bike.

name: Softail Leather Saddlebags - Fat Boy Styling
description: Styled to complement the '00-'06 Fat Boy™ motorcycle with the distinctive Fat Boy™ concho, wider is definitely better when it comes to these bags.
details: Fits '00-'17 Softail™ models (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTC, FLSTNSE, FXCW, FXCWC, FXS, FXSB, FXSBSE, FXSE, and FXSTD). Also fits '09 FXSTSSE models. FXSTC models require separate purchase of Hardware Kit P/N 90573-07. Also fits '84-'99 FLSTF, FXST, FXSTC and FXSTS models without H-D™ Detachables™ accessories when installed with Directional Relocation Kit P/N 53692-96. Does not fit with Rear Axle Covers, Wide Tire Kit P/N 43684-99A or Flat Lens Turn Signal Kit P/N 68431-95. FLSTFBS models require the removal of Original Equipment Rear Axle Covers.

name: Synthetic Leather Saddlebags
description: Combine street attitude with long-haul versatility and you get these custom Sportster Saddlebags. Styled with sweeping lines to complement the Sportster™ fender, these bags feature plenty of storage space for a ride to the store, or to Sturgis.
details: Fits ’04-later XL models (except XL1200T, 02-03 883R, models with sidemount license plates, models equipped with Rear Axle Covers,  Flat Lens Turn Signals, or models equipped with 2-into-1 exhaust). ’04-later models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68732-02A (Domestic), P/N 68733-02A (International) or Layback License Plate Kit P/N 60215-06.’11-later XL1200C fitment requires purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 67800071 (Domestic) or 67800077 (International).

name: Bar & Shield Leather Saddlebag
description: These genuine leather saddlebags deliver style and large capacity all in one. Constructed around a rigid plastic tub for long term durability, the leather bag features a stylish design with lines that enhance the smooth Dyna™ profile.
details: Fits '02-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD, '02-'05 FXDWG, and '09-'17 FXDB with optional strut covers). '02-'05 models require separate purchase of Mounting Hardware Kit P/N 92025-09. '10-'17 FXDWG models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68544-10. '09-'17 FXDB models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit 68227-09. '13-later FXDB models equipped with side-mount license plate requires License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 67900130. '16-'17 FXDLS models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit 68227-09 and Side Mount License Plate kit P/N 60938-10 or 60978-10. All other years and models (except FXDF and FXDWG) require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit 68732-02A (Domestic), 68733-02A (International) or Layback License Plate Kit 60215-06. Not for use with Rear Axle Covers on FXDF and FXDWG models.

name: H-D Detachables Docking Hardware Kit
description: This kit was developed specifically for the rider who wishes to install H-D™ Detachables™ with the popular Saddlebag Kit P/Ns 90598-04 and 90342-04, providing the proper spacing necessary to install these bags with Detachables.

name: Synthetic Leather Saddlebags
description: These synthetic leather saddlebags deliver both style and large capacity at a low cost. The rigid plastic tub is wrapped in synthetic leather for long-term durability.
details: Fits '02-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD, '02-'05 FXDWG, and '09-'17 FXDB with optional strut covers). '02-'05 models require separate purchase of Mounting Hardware Kit P/N 92025-09. '10-'17 FXDWG models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit P/N 68544-10. '09-'17 FXDB models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit 68227-09. '13-'17 FXDB models equipped with side-mount license plate requires License Plate Relocation Kit P/N 67900130. '16-'17 FXDLS models require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit 68227-09 and Side Mount License Plate kit P/N 60938-10 or 60978-10. All other years and models (except FXDF and FXDWG) require separate purchase of Turn Signal Relocation Kit 68732-02A (Domestic), 68733-02A (International) or Layback License Plate Kit 60215-06. Not for use with Rear Axle Covers on FXDF and FXDWG models.

name: Color-Matched Saddlebag Latch Plate - Right Side
description: Color-Matched Saddlebag Latch Plates are an easy way to give your Touring bike a unique monochrome look. Painted to match factory colors, these latches add a splash of color to the motorcycle profile.
details: Fits '93-'13 Touring models equipped with color-matched hard saddlebags.  HDI models require separate purchase of Reflectors P/N 59289-92 and 59290-92.

name: Color-Matched Saddlebag Latch Plate - Left Side
description: Color-Matched Saddlebag Latch Plates are an easy way to give your Touring bike a unique monochrome look. Painted to match factory colors, these latches add a splash of color to the motorcycle profile.
details: Fits '93-'13 Touring models equipped with color-matched hard saddlebags.  HDI models require separate purchase of Reflectors P/N 59289-92 and 59290-92.

name: Heritage Softail Style Saddlebags
description: Original Equipment on the '06-'08 Heritage Softail™ Classic model, these top grade cowhide saddlebags feature reinforced rim and sides to help maintain their shape.
details: Fits '00-'17 FLSTC models. Also fits '00-'17 FLST models (except FLSTN, FLSTNSE and '10-12 FLSTSE) with the separate purchase of Saddlebag Hardware Kit P/N 79304-96

name: Saddlebag Support Kit
description: Eliminate the rear saddlebag guard for a sleek, custom appearance. This kit replaces the loop saddlebag guard with a bolt-on chrome-plated support leg.
details: Fits '09-'13 Touring models (except FLHRC and FLHTCUSE). Stock on '09-'13 FLHX, FLHXSE, FLTR, FLTRU, FLTRX, FLTRXSE, '13 FLHRSE and '09 FLTRSE models. Does not fit with Saddlebag Filler Strip Kits.

name: Twin Rail Saddlebag Guard Kit
description: Each kit comes with rear saddlebag guards, side rails, mounting hardware, and instructions for easy installation.

name: Saddlebag Supports
description: Fit with or without Sissy Bar Uprights, attach easily, and protect bags from contacting brake and swingarm.
details: Fits '06-'17 Dyna™ models (except FLD). Does not fit with H-D™ Detachables™ Sissy Bars or Racks.

name: Studded Leather Sissy Bar Bag
description: Heavy, full-grain Latigo leather is specially tanned, oiled, and waxed to withstand the elements.
details: For use with FXDWG (except '10 FXDWG with Original Equipment Sissy Bar) and FXSTC models only.

name: Heritage Chrome Front Fender Rail
description: A stylish re-creation of a popular Hydra Glide™ model accessory direct from the Harley-Davidson™ 1959 accessories catalog. Ornate, jet, twin-tube design sweeps smartly back along the front fender.
details: Fits '87-'17 FLST, FLSTC, and '93-'96 FLSTN models. (Does not fit Springer™ models.)

name: Touring V-Logo Front Fender Rail
description: A stylish re-creation of a popular Hydra Glide™ accessory, this twin tube design sweeps smartly back along the front fender.
details: Fits '80-'13 FLHR, FLHRC, FLHT, FLHTC, FLHTCU, FLHTK and FLT, '80-'93 FLHS and '09-'13 FLHTCUTG models.

name: Touring V-Logo Rear Fender Rail
description: Designed with a similar styling theme to match our Touring V-Logo Front Fender Rail P/N 91099-94A. The Touring V-Logo Rear Fender Rail replaces the stock rear fender rail and rubber bumper on Touring models.
details: Fits '09-later FLHR, FLHRC, FLHT, FLHTC, FLHTCU, FLHTCUL, FLHTK, FLHTKL, FLTR, FLTRK, and FLTRU models. Does not fit with mud flaps.

name: Switch Housing Hardware Kit
description: Convert your housings from black to chrome with this complete kit.
details: Fits '96-later models (except '15-later XG, '04-later XL and XR and '15-later Softail™, Touring and Trike).

name: Leather Tank Panel with Fat Boy Concho
description: Give your Softail™ additional attitude with this leather tank panel featuring an authentic Fat Boy™ concho.
details: Fits ’93-’03 FXDWG and ’00-'17 Softail™ models (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTNSE, FLSTSB, FLSTSE, FXCW, FXCWC, FXS, FXSB, FXSBSE, FXSE, FXSTD, FXSTSSE, ’06 FLSTFSE and ’09-'17 FLSTC).

name: Premium Tank Panel with Pouch
description: This leather tank panel features an over-sized pouch for convenient "at your fingertips" storage.
details: Fits ’93-’08 FXDWG, ’06 FXD35, ’07-'17 FXDC and FXDF and ’00-'17 Softail™ models (except FLS, FLSS, FLSTNSE, FLSTSB, FLSTSE, FXCW, FXCWC, FXS, FXSB, FXSBSE, FXSE, FXSTD, FXSTSSE, ’09-'17 FLSTC and ’06 FLSTFSE). ’93-’03 FXDWG models require the separate purchase of Clip P/N 10102 and O-Ring P/N 11174.

name: Bar & Shield Front Fender Spear- Small
description: This chrome-plated trim spear adds a sweeping dash of chrome to the front fender. Featuring a raised Bar & Shield graphic set against a textured black field, this self-adhesive medallion is easy-to-install.
details: Fits XL, XR, Dyna™ (except FLD) , FX Softail™ (except FXFB) and '18-later FLSL models.

name: Bar & Shield Large Front Fender Spear
description: This chrome-plated trim spear adds a sweeping dash of chrome to the front fender. Featuring a raised Bar & Shield graphic set against a textured black field, this self-adhesive medallion is easy-to-install.
details: Fits '12-'16 FLD, '86-'17 FL Softail™ (except FLSTSB), '18-later FLDE, FLHC and FLHCS, and '84-later Touring and Trike models.

name: Twin Rail Chrome Saddlebag Guard Kit
description: Each kit comes with rear saddlebag guards, side rails, mounting hardware, and instructions for easy installation.

name: Willie G Skull Teardrop Mirrors
description: Add a little attitude to your ride. Styled to complement Harley-Davidson™ Skull accessory items, the menacing raised skull with black-filled eyes leaps from a field of chrome.
details: Fits '82-later models (except VRSCF, XG750A, '14-'16 FLHR, FLHRC and FLHRSE, '11-'13 FLHTCUSE, '14-later FLHTKSE and '18-later FLTRXSE). Does not fit XL1200X models with mirrors  mounted below the handlebar.

name: Sprocket Cover
description: This Sprocket Cover gives the appearance of having a chrome sprocket at a fraction of the cost.
details: Fits '00-'06 Softail™ models.

name: Heritage Chrome Rear Fender Rail
description: A perfect match to Heritage Chrome Front Fender Rail P/N 91080-93.
details: Fits '00-'17 FLST and FLSTC models.

name: Remote Control Garage Door Opener Kit
description: Operate your automatic garage door opener without leaving your motorcycle seat or fumbling in your pocket for the remote control.
details: Fits '02-'17 VRSC™, '15-later XG,  '94-later XL, '08-'13 XR, '96-'17 Dyna™, '96- later Softail™, and '94-later Touring and Trike models. '14-later XL, '12- '17 Dyna™ and '11-'17 Softail™ models require separate purchase of Electrical Connection Kit P/N 72673-11. '14-'16 Touring and Trike models require separate purchase of Electrical Connection Kit P/N 69200722. '18-later Softail™ and '17-later Touring and Trike models require separate purchase of Electrical Connection Kit P/N 69201599A. '15-later XG models require separate purchase of P/N 72136-94GY, 72156-94 and Qty.4 72195-94. Not compatible with Chamberlain™ /Liftmaster™  MyQ™  or Sears™  Craftsman Assurelink garage door openers.

name: Remote Control Garage Door Opener Transmitter
description: This kit allows owners of the Remote Garage Door Opener Kit P/N 91558-01B to equip each of their Harley-Davidson™ motorcycles with a remote transmitter.

name: Remote Control Garage Door Opener Receiver
description: This additional receiver permits the owner of the Remote Garage Door Opener Kit P/N 91558-01 to operate more than one garage door opener from a single transmitter.
details: For use with Remote Control Garage Door Opener Kit P/N 91558-01B. Not compatible with Chamberlain™/Liftmaster™ MyQ™ or Sears™ Craftsman AssureLink™ garage door openers.

name: Chrome Center Stand
description: Lifting your bike upright and off the side stand is ideal for cleaning and servicing, and reduces the space required for parking - handy where space is at a premium in a crowded garage, a small parking spot, or at a ride-in bike show.
details: Fits '09-later Touring models (except FLHTKSE, FLTRUSE, '07-'11 FLHTCUSE and models equipped with Adjustable Passenger Footboard Mount Kit P/N 50768-07) with Original Equipment or Profile Low Suspension.

name: Road Tech zumo 660 & 665 Fairing Mount Kit
description: This installation kit is designed to allow fairing mounting of the Road Tech™ zumo 660 or 665 GPS System on specified Harley-Davidson™ models. Positioned for convenient viewing by both the rider and passenger, the Mounting Kit easily accepts the slide-in connection cradle for the Road Tech™ zumo 660 or 665 GPS System.
details: Fits '96-'13 Electra Glide™, Street Glide™ and Trike models equipped with Road Tech™ Zumo 660 or 665 GPS unit. Does not fit with Road Tech™ SiriusXM Satellite Radio P/N 76390-05A, '06-'10 CVO™ Electra Glide™ models or models equipped with Fairing Dash Pad P/N 58262-05.

name: Buckshot Mirrors

name: Edge Cut Stem Mirrors

name: Gloss Black Engine Cover Kit – Milwaukee-Eight Powertrain
description: Upgrade your black and chrome Milwaukee-Eight™ motor to the sinister look of gloss black. These richly finished engine covers start your bike on its journey to the dark side.

name: Screamin' Eagle Milwaukee-Eight Engine Stage III Kit - 107CI to 119CI
description: This Stage III kit has been developed for the rider looking for a solid “seat of the pants” increase you can feel every time you roll on the throttle. The bump up in displacement and compression deliver a significant increase in torque and power over stock, all the while restoring the sensation of riding solo when you’re loaded down. Plus there’s a one-year manufacturer’s warranty and eligibility for coverage under factory vehicle warranty when dealer-installed within 60 days of vehicle...
details: Fits '18-later Softail™ models equipped with 107CI Milwaukee Eight engine. FXFB models require separate purchase of Screamin' Eagle Softail High-Flow Exhaust System P/N's 64900828 or 64900829. Requires separate purchase of Cam Drive Retention Kit P/N 25566-06. Installation may require Cam Spacer Kit P/N 25928-06. All models require ECM calibration with Screamin' Eagle Pro Street Tuner for proper installation. Does not fit California models.

name: Screamin' Eagle Milwaukee-Eight Engine Stage III Kit - 107CI to 119CI
description: This Stage III kit has been developed for the rider looking for a solid “seat of the pants” increase you can feel every time you roll on the throttle. The bump up in displacement and compression deliver a significant increase in torque and power over stock, all the while restoring the sensation of riding solo when you’re loaded down. Plus there’s a one-year manufacturer’s warranty and eligibility for coverage under factory vehicle warranty when dealer-installed within 60 days of vehicle...
details: Fits '18-later Softail™ models equipped with 107CI Milwaukee Eight engine. FXFB models require separate purchase of Screamin' Eagle Softail High-Flow Exhaust System P/N's 64900828 or 64900829. Requires separate purchase of Cam Drive Retention Kit P/N 25566-06. Installation may require Cam Spacer Kit P/N 25928-06. All models require ECM calibration with Screamin' Eagle Pro Street Tuner for proper installation. Does not fit California models.

name: Screamin' Eagle Milwaukee-Eight Engine Stage III Kit - 114CI or 117CI to 122CI
description: This Stage III kit has been developed for the rider looking for a solid “seat of the pants” increase you can feel every time you roll on the throttle. The bump up in displacement and compression deliver a significant increase in torque and power over stock, all the while restoring the sensation of riding solo when you’re loaded down. Plus there’s a one-year manufacturer’s warranty and eligibility for coverage under factory vehicle warranty when dealer-installed within 60 days of vehicle...
details: Fits '18-later Softail™ models equipped with 114 or 117CI Milwaukee Eight engines. Requires separate purchase of Cam Drive Retention Kit P/N 25566-06. Installation may require Cam Spacer Kit P/N 25928-06. FXFB and FXFBS models require separate purchase of Screamin' Eagle Softail High Flow Exhaust P/N's 64900828 or 64900829. FXDR114 models require separate purchase of Header Pipe Assembly P/N 65600300. All models require ECM calibration with Screamin' Eagle Pro Street Tuner for proper installation. Does not fit California models.

name: Siren Disc Brake Lock

name: Security Anchor

name: Retractable Cable Lock

details: Universal

name: Universal Mount Helmet Lock
description: Lock your lid. This Universal Helmet Lock secures your helmet through its D-Rings directly to motorcycle so the helmet can’t be dropped or stolen.
details: Fits any .875"-1.25" tubing including Frame Tube, Engine Guard, Handlebar, or Saddlebag Guard.

name: Universal Mount Helmet Lock - Black
description: Lock your lid. This Universal Helmet Lock secures your helmet through its D-Rings directly to motorcycle so the helmet can’t be dropped or stolen.

details: For use with models with vehicle weight up to 3000 lbs (1360 kg) and front or rear wheel size of 14" to 22" (355-560mm) rim diameter and 3.15" to 8.66" (80mm-220mm) nominal wheel width. Not for use with Custom Wrapped Front Fenders.

name: Center Stand

name: Cruiser Cradle Universal E-Track Adapter Kit-92900043

This backpack-style bag has a cavernous main compartment large enough for a pair of boots, a change of clothes, an extra jacket or sweatshirt and extra gloves and hats. details: Installation requires a sissy bar upright and backrest pad.  Luggage rack required if not mounting on passenger pillion.  Does not fit XR1200, XR1200X, FXDRS, and XG models.

name: Black Standard Line Sissy Bar/Solo Bag

Sunglasses and other small items fit conveniently in the small front pocket while the draw-bridge style outer pocket features two removable tool pouches (tools not included) which can also be used to organize cords and key. An elasticized side pouch fits a large water bottle.

name: Overwatch Small Handlebar Bag
description: The Overwatch Small Handlebar Bag is perfect for packing essential items. This bag features one main interior pocket that is the perfect place to put your phone, wallet and keys while riding your motorcycle.
details: Fits Original Equipment and Accessory risers that are 2" or taller.  Does not fit XL models if equipped with triple clamp-integrated risers and 4" diameter riser-mounted speedometers. Fits with some windshields.

name: Overwatch Large Handlebar Bag

This bag features a removable top compartment with a clear plastic touchscreen pouch that is perfect for holding your phone or GPS. The top pouch also has a zippered compartment that is perfect for storing your wallet and keys. The larger main compartment features one zip and one mesh pocket for organization.

name: Onyx Premium Luggage Tour-Pak Rack Bag

The Tour-Pak Rack Bag is designed to fit atop most Tour-Pak™ Luggage Racks, providing the additional storage you need for long trips. The main compartment features three mesh pockets for easy organization while also providing enough space to stow clothes for a short trip. Outside the bag, the top...
details: Fits models equipped with Tour-Pak Luggage Racks (except FLRT and FLHXXX or Mini Rack P/N 53100-96).

name: Onyx Premium Luggage Collapsible Tour-Pak Rack Bag
description: Designed by riders for riders, the Onyx Premium Luggage Collection is the best luggage Harley-Davidson has to offer and, provides everything you need in motorcycle luggage and nothing you don't. This Collapsible Rack Bag has the added benefit that it can be folded down to a fraction of its expanded size and placed in a saddlebag when not in use. Take it with you on your trip and bring home all the T-shirts and extra things you may buy at a rally or on a long trip.

name: Onyx Premium Luggage Rider Backrest Pad
description: Designed by riders for riders, the Onyx Premium Luggage Collection is the best luggage Harley-Davidson has to offer and, provides everything you need in motorcycle luggage and nothing you don't. name: Adventure Duffel Bag

The roll-top design and multiple compression straps make it possible to cinch the load tightly and give this...

name: K&N Power Kleen 32 fl oz Air Filter Cleaner
description: Clean and restore the original performance of K&N air filter elements. The washable and rechargeable filters use a special coating to help filter fine particles from the incoming air. With time, the oil in the filter will dissipate and the element will begin to turn gray. Clean the surface and renew the original red color with an application of K&N Air Filter Care products.

name: Travel Care Kit

name: Seat, Saddlebag & Trim Cleaner

name: Quick Wash

name: Fireman Style Hose Nozzle
description: Durable metal body wont rust or corrode and soft rubber nose cone protects bike surfaces from accidental contact.
details: Universal Fitment.

name: Bare Metal Polish

name: Spray Cleaner & Polish
